Dhala Yesus ki hil mo mo dhali ’kar mo ki e mo dhali o imanciḵ a’di gwo gwo mo ki: Mii wa’di diṯa/ gom uni gwansan kun ta pa ki pa mo mmocic̱ Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo be.

Dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo merkin gom gwom piti yansan mo be. Hila Yesus ki o uni gwo mo doḵ/e ki: Uc̱iya, a’di wana mii diṯa/ gom uni gun gamki gwo is gom pam buni kun tana uni mo mmocic̱ Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo.
A’di ’disha mii ki ’dish gom kalman mo mmoya ki solol e jis ma ’dip̱ira/ mo mmodhal wathimpa e i is mo, a’di jin ta pa ki pa mo mmocic̱ Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
Dhali uni ’kokin mo mmomer mo ka daran duŋ gana/ mo dhali o gwo ka rem ’kup̱ mo ki: Ba waḵki/ wakan mo tani ija a’di iminu iwoṯẖ moyi?
Yesus ki hil uni mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Ki ’kwani mo tani a’di molu mii mo, hili ka Arumgimis mo tani aris to ’baar mo mishu mii ka Arumgimis mo be.
Hila Buṯerus ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmo/o a’di gwo mo ki: Hili, aman dhalkina aris to ’peni ’baar mo dhali baṯẖ /e nsho’k mo be.

Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ona um gwo mo ki: wathiŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin dhalki gu’b piti ’pen mo walla ikam piti mo walla i’bwah piti mo walla kum mo walla com mo walla uc̱i mo walla mo mo gom gway pem mo dhali gom gway gi gwom ’borga/ mo tani

a’di jin midi diki bu’th to ki me’d iss ’kwanimpa ka mudhe’d mo shwane/ mo ki mo yansan mo, gu’b mina a’di gam mo dhali ikam piti mo dhali i’bwaham piti mo dhali ikum mo dhali uc̱i mo dhali mo mo nyaḵki to kun mini ṯo’c a’di ’kus mo, dhali ki she yil yan jin midi p̱u’du/ mo tani a’di midi gam mondiki/e ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo be.
Hili aris uni gun ’koni ṯwa/a/ mo tani uni minu dhu ŋ’ko’d mo dhali uni gun ’koni ’ko’d mo tani uni minu dhu iṯwa/a/ mo be.

Dhali uni ’kokin mo mmo/ii i bway mo mmo/ii ka gagamis mo e Pa Urushaliim mo dhala Yesus yaki’di shu uni bway mo. Dhali uni ’kokin mo mmomer mo dhali uni gwansan kun baṯẖki a’di nsho’k mo tani ḵo/ki is mo. Dhali a’di ki sus uni gun ’koni ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo doḵ/e dhali a’di ki ṯel mii ’pen mo dhali ṯor uni gwo mo gom to gun minu mii a’di mo be,

mmo/o gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma, ana iina ka gagamis mo e Pa Urushaliim mo, dhali Ya/ gi ’Kwani minu c̱i mo e igasiis kun can mo dhali iman’kwar to mo, dhali uni mini waḵ a’di mo mmo’kosh a’di jwa mo, dhali a’di minu c̱iki ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ ime’d mo be.
Dhali uni mini mii a’di ka maḵ mo dhali ’taḵ a’di manya/ i is mo dhali dor a’di mo dhali ’kosh a’di jwa mo. Dhali ’ko’da cim kwara mo tani a’di midi piyu/ ka pije/ mo be.

Dhala Yakuub dhala Yohaan uni gun ta iya/ ma Sabadi mo tani p̱u’dkin kadhoŋ ’kup̱ ki a’di mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Amanṯor Gwo, aman ona bwa ki /e mini dhal aman bway mo gom to jin mina amani doṯ ’peni /e mo be.
Dhala Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Atinta o um bwa mo jin miga/ mii gom um mo?
Dhali uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Dhas am bway mo ma mmo’ko mo. Jan ’de/ midi c̱a’b /e ki me’da bim poros pini mo dhali jan ’de/ midi c̱a’b /e ki me’da biny cam pini mo e monycam pini mo be.
Hila Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Um ’koki mish to jin doṯa um mo. A/um mini p̱iya ḵubbaaya jin p̱ikika/ mo walla a/um minu cuc̱ mo ki mii jin miinuwa mii ki yi’de/ mo jin miikunu aha/ mo?

Dhali uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Aman mina mish mii mo be. Dhala Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Aḵubbaaya jin p̱ika/ mo tani mina umi p̱i mo dhali mo jin miinu aha/ amii ki yi’de/ mo tani a’di imiinu mii um si’da/ mo be.
Hili mmo’ko aha/ ki me’da bim poros pem mo walla ki me’da biny cam pem mo tani a’di diki ta miim pem mo mmodhas um bway mo, hili a’di gom uni gwansan kun thosonkunu uni mo be.
Dhali ki uni gun ’koni ’kume’d ciḵki gwo yansan mo tani uni ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmodeḵa nyor mo goma Yakuub mo dhala Yohaan mo be.

Dhala Yesus ki yuḵ uni mo i a’di mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Um mishki gwo mo gom uni gwansan kun o ki ta tap̱a ap̱o/ ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo tani uni mii miin tap̱a ap̱o/ uni mo dhali ’kwanim buni gun eḵa/ eḵ kun ta gi moshirr mo ap̱o/ uni mo be.
Hili mii yansan minu ’koki mii wakan ap̱o/ um mo. Hili a’diyin jin midi eḵa/ eḵ mo e bwam um mo tani a’di midi mii ta a’di jin midi mii um to mo be.
Haali/ a’diyin jin midi mii ta jin ṯwa/a/ mbwaman um mo tani a’di midi mii ta c̱iŋkina/ gom umi ’baar mo be.
Haali/ Ya/ gi ’Kwani si’da/ p̱u’dki’d mo yisa ki a’di minu mii to mo, hili ki a’di midi mii ’kwani to mo dhali c̱i mondiki/em piti mo mmota Amanwan ’Kwani ’Ba/ ka ris mo be.

Dhali uni p̱u’dkin mo e Pa Ariiha mo. Dhali ki a’di di’d mmodhal Pa Ariiha ’pen mo nyaḵki imanciḵ a’di gwo mo tani adhana waambuhany wathimpa caaca kagahara mo. Dhali wathiny ja’daŋ kamu/ diki’d jin yuḵkunu gway ka Barṯimawuus mo jin ta’da man’tho to mo, a’di jin ta ya/ ma Ṯimawuus mo, a’di c̱a’bki’d mo e shemen bway isa yempa/ mo.
Dhali ki a’di ciḵki gwo goma Yesus ki Pa Naasira mo tani a’di ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmocuu gwo ki dhan ’twa/ jin caaca mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Yesus, jin ta Ya/ ma Dawuu’d. Miiyi mii ap̱o/ aha/ mo ma.
Dhali ’kwani ka ris ḵucurki a’di ki gwo mo mmoṯor a’di gwo mo mmoc̱a’b ki shwam mo. Hili a’di cuuki’d kagahara ki nyanye/ ki nyanye/ mo ki: Ya/ ma Dawuu’d. Miiyi mii ap̱o/ aha/ mo ma.
Dhala Yesus doshki’d mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Yuḵi a’di mo ma. Dhali uni ki yuḵi wathiny ja’da/ mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Budhi adu mo ma. Cuyi mis mo. A’di yuḵki /e mo be.
Dhali a’di biṯki burrinye/ ma p̱om piti a’cesh mo dhali a’di ki p̱e imis mo dhali ya aYesus mo.
Dhala Yesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Ata o /e bwa jin miga/ mii gom /e mo. Dhali wathiny ja’da/ ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Tap̱a, dhalki aha/ butha momish mom pem mo ma.
Dhala Yesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Yaku/ i bway pini mo. Moŋgam gwo is pini a’di woṯẖki /e mo. Dhali ki jahanne/ a’di ki bu’th momish mo mo dhali baṯẖ a’di nsho’k ibway mo be.
Dhali ki uni ’dishki Pa Urushaliim is mo e Pam Beeṯp̱aji mo dhali e Pam Beeṯaniya mo e ’Kuwosh Seṯuun mo tani a’di ki hash imanciḵ a’di gwo isu/ mo be

dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Iiku/ i bampa/ jin di’d ka p̱ar ’twa/ i um mo, dhali ki jahanne/ ki um mini cic̱ a’di mo tani um mini gam ari thuluny jin shi’du/ mo. A’di yisa merkina wathiŋ kamu/ ap̱owa. ’Cuḵi a’di mo dhali guyu/ a’di mo.
Waḵki/ wathin ’deŋ kamu/ midi o um gwo mo ki: Atinta mina um kan mo tani ṯori a’di gwo mo ki: Tap̱a a’di midi mii ta gi a’di mo dhali midi hashu/ a’di ka nyaŋ’ko’d ki jahanne/ mo imahan mo.
Dhali uni iikin mo dhali gam ari thuluny jin shi’dkunu mo e ’twaŋkal bway tura beega/ mo. Dhali uni ’cuḵki a’di mo be.
Dhali uni gwansan kun doshkin mo tani o uni gwo mo ki: Atinta imina um kan mo sa/? Um ’cuḵi ari thuluny gomata?
Dhali uni ki ṯor uni gwo mo gom gwo jin okin ma Yesus mo, dhali uni ki dhal uni bway mo mmo/ii mo be.
Dhali uni ki susi ari thulunya Yesus mo dhali uni ki p̱a’d burrinyem buni ap̱o/ a’di mo dhali a’di ki mer a’di ap̱o/ mo be.
Dhali ’kwani ka ris uni p̱a’dki burrinyem buni e bway tur mo be. Dhali kun tiya p̱a’dkina biny cwa kun ḵwa/kina uni ’peni bwam bunto mo be.

Dhali uni gwansan kun iikini ṯwa/a/ mo dhali uni gwansan kun baṯẖki uni nsho’k mo tani uni ḵumki cuuwa/ mo ki ’twa/ kun caaca mo ki: Hosanna. Mom’bor mii midi di mo gom a’di jin p̱u’dki’d ki gway gi Tap̱a mo be.
Mom’bor mii midi di mo gom Bampa/ ma ababam bana ka Dawuu’d a’di jin p̱u’dki’d mo. Hosanna jin di’di mis mo.

Dhali a’di cic̱ki’d mo e Pa Urushaliim mo dhali a’di seki gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo be. Dhali ki a’di hilki mo mo dhali ’kara ris to ’baar mo ki e mo tani dhali ŋ’ko’d a’di ki doḵ Pam Beeṯaniya nyaḵki uni gun ’koni ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo haala tente/ yulu’d mo be.
Dhali ka cim jin baṯẖa’di ’ko’d mo tani ki uni p̱u’dkin mo e Pam Beeṯaniya mo tani a’di ’koshkina ṯe/ mo be.

Dhali a’di mishki’da p̱u/ ’pena dhana/ mo jin lu/u’d mo. A’di ki ya mo mmop̱ar e mo waḵki/ a’di midi ’taki gam maman ’peni a’di mo. Ki a’di p̱u’dki’di a’di mo tani a’di diki gam toŋ kamu/ mo hili jasi ’cemen gana/ mo haali/ a’di diki ta yil ma p̱u/ mmodho’th mo be.
Dhali a’di ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ midi diki shwa maman ’peni /e doḵ/e mo ki sule/. Dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo ciḵki gwo yansan mo be.

Dhali uni p̱u’dkin mo e Pa Urushaliim mo. Dhali ki a’di cic̱ki gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo tani dhali a’di ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmo/ur uni gwansan ka pije/ kun yoli to mo, dhali uni gwansan kun yolki to mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo. Dhali a’di ki kuma tharabeesa ’twa/ a’cesh mo gun ta ku gi uni gwansan kun wanki emena guurush mo dhali a’di ki kum to ’twa/ a’cesh mo kun ’kona imanyol gurko/ mo be.
Dhali a’di diki dhal uni bway mo mmo’do ton tiya mmo’ciṯẖ ki tur mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo be.

Dhali a’di ṯorki gwo mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: A’di diki ta gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo ’taa? ki: Gu’b pem minu yuḵ ki gu’b jin minu ’tho goma ris kal gi ’kwaniny’ceshi ’baar mo? Hili um ki mii a’di me’d gu’b gi ’kwani kun ta imandil to mo be.

Dhali igasiis kun can dhali iman’kwar to mo uni ciḵki gwo yan mo dhali uni ŋap̱ki bway mo mmo’ce’d a’di sho’k mo haali/ uni ḵo/ki a’di mo haali/ awaambuhany ’kwani caaca kagahara mo merkin mo gom gwom piti jin ṯorkina a’di mo be.
Dhali ki mom’pimpili/ p̱u’dki’d mo tani a’di dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo uni iikin ka pije/ mo ’peni ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo.
Me’d jin iikina uni ki iimpe mo mon’thamo/ mo tani uni p̱arkina p̱u/ e mo mmoḵu’thkina a’di hila/ ka birman ilu/ mo be.
Dhala Buṯerus kakina gwo e mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Tap̱a. Hila p̱u/ mo ma, a’di jin jeekina /e mo tani a’di ḵu’thki’d mo be.
Dhala Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Tayi gi moŋgam gwo is mo eya Arumgimis mo.

Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ona um gwo mo ki: A’diyin jin midi o wosh yansan gwo mo ki: Dhalki a’di gunu mo dhali biṯ mo e bwaŋ ḵumma/ yi’de/ mo dhali diki ta ga du jin shi/i gwo ’kup̱ mo tani, hili a’di gamki gwo is gom a’di jin okina a’di mo tani ki a’di midi p̱u’d mo tani a’di minu mii gom a’di mo be.
Wakan aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki a’diyin jin mina umi doṯ ki mon’tho mo tani gami gwo is mo ma, ki a’di mina umi bu’th mo dhali um mini bu’th a’di mo be.

Dhali ma mo yin jin mina umi dosh mo mmo’tho mo tani dhalki a’di ’pen mo waḵki/ um ta gi gwo jin ona um is ap̱o/ cin tiya mo tani wakan si’da/ Ababam bum jin di’d e momis mo midi dhal um gwon dhaŋ bum ’pen mo be.
Hili waḵki/ um ’koki dhal ’kwani amure/ miinthus buni ’pen mo tani wakan si’da/ Ababam bum jin di’d e momis mo midi diki dhal um amure/ miinthus gi gwon dhaŋ bum ’pen mo be.

Dhali uni p̱u’dkin doḵ/e mo e Pa Urushaliim mo. Dhali ki a’di diki’d mmoya e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo tani igasiis kun can dhali iman’kwar to mo dhali ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ mo uni pu’dkini a’di mo be.
Dhali uni ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Ki moshirr jana sa/ imiikina /e aris to gwansani ’baar mo, walla kaja ic̱iki /e moshirr yansan mo mmomii uni mo?
Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Aha/ si’da/ mina doṯ um gwondoṯ mo. Thoḵi aha/ gwo mo ma dhali aha/ mina ṯor um a’di jin c̱iki aha/ moshirr mmomii aris to gwansan mo be.
Mo jin miin ma Yohaana mii ki yi’de/ mo tani, a’di ’peni momis mo ’taa? walla ’peni ’kwani mo? Thoḵ aha/ gwo mo ma.
Dhali uni garki gwo ’kusi ’twa/ ka rem ’kup̱ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Waḵki/ aman mina o gwo mo ki: ’Peni momis mo tani, a’di midi o am gwo mo ki: Batinta ’kona um ki gam a’di gwo is mo?
Hili waḵki/ aman mina o ki: ’Peni ’kwani mo tani uni ḵo/ki ’kwani mo haali/ aris ’kwani ’baar mo karkina Yohaan ka manc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis gana/ mo be.
Wakan uni thoḵkina Yesus gwo mo ki: Aman ’konaki mish mo mo. Dhala Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Wakan si’da/ aha/ mina diki ṯor um gwo mo gom a’di jin c̱iki aha/ moshirr mo mmomii to gwansan mo be.

Dhali a’di ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmoṯor uni gwo mo ki gwom ’bi’th/e mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Wathi/ diki’d mo jin siki’da mura’th mo dhali a’di ki nyaŋa goŋ mo mmo’kam a’di is mo dhali a’di ki c̱wany jis gom yimana mura’th mo dhali a’di ki nyaŋ ’kuḵuma/ isi mis mo, dhali a’di ki dhal a’di e imanmii to ka guurush mo dhali a’di ki ya bampaŋ kamu/ jin si’dasi’d mo be.
Dhali ki mo p̱u’dki’d mo tani a’di ki hash c̱iŋkinaŋ kamu/ e imanmii to ka guurush mo mmo’taki ḵali maman cwan tiya ’peni monsinu mo be.
Dhali uni bu’thki a’di mo dhali dor a’di mo dhali uni ki hash a’di me’d ’te/ mo be.
Doḵ/e a’di ki hash ki uni c̱iŋkinaŋ kamu/ i uni mo dhali uni waki a’di ’kup̱ ki jama/ mo dhali uni ki mii a’di ka jin thus ki mon’the is mo be.
Dhali a’di ki hashki uni jaŋ kamu/ mo dhali a’di si’da/ ’koshkina uni jwa mo. Dhali wakan si’da/ kun tiya ka ris ’koshkina uni mo dhali kun tiya dorkina uni mo dhali kun tiya ’koshkina uni jwa mo be.

A’di ta’d gi jasi jin ṯal ’deŋ gana/ mo jin di’di a’di mo, a’di jin ta ya/m piti jin ena a’di ki en gana/ mo. Ŋ’ko’d a’di ki uṯẖki uni ya/m piti mo mmohashki a’di e uni mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Uni mini taḵ ya/m pem mo be.
Hili uni gwansan kun miiki to ka guurush mo o gwo mo ka rem ’kup̱ mo ki: Amanḵal mala c̱aan p̱u’dki’d mo. Dhalki ana ’kosha a’di jwa mo dhali mal midi ta jim bana mo be.
Dhali uni bu’thki a’di mo dhali ’kosh a’di mo dhali kar a’di ’pen ka pije/ mo ’peni bwam monsinu mo be.
Ata mina com gi mo ma mura’th i mii mo sa/? A’di midi p̱u’du/ mo dhali ’ce’d uni gwansan sho’k mo kun miiki to ka guurush mo dhali c̱i mo ma mura’th ki ’kwanin tiya mo be.
’Kona um ki deŋ Gwo e mo ’taa? Gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo. Ka dhan wosha caaga/ yansan jin waḵkina imannyaŋ gu’b mo tani warki’d ki dhan wosh gi ’kup̱an ma rukun gu’b mo.
Yansan ta mii gi Tap̱a mo be. Dhali a’di ta dhan mii jin meru em bana mo be.
Dhali uni palki mii mo mmo’taki cesh a’di mo tani hili uni ḵo/kina waambuhany ’kwani mo haali/ uni nyiṯẖkin ki a’di ṯorki gwom ’bi’th/e yansan ap̱o/ uni mo. Wakan uni dhalki a’di mo dhali ii mo be.
Dhali uni hashki a’di ’kwanin tiya ’peni ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin mo dhali ’kwanin tiya ’peni ’Kwani ma Hirodusiyiin mo mmo’taki cesh a’di ki gwo jin ona a’di mo.

Dhali uni p̱u’dkin mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Amanṯor Gwowa, aman misha ki /e ta a’diŋ gana/ mo dhali /e diki mii mii ka gwar ’de/ mo gom wathiŋ kamu/ mo, haali e diki taḵ ’kwani gom monycam buni mo hili ka jiŋ gana e ṯori gwo gi bway ma Arumgimis mo be. A/a’di ta gwoŋḵan jin minu c̱ika Kaysara thulp̱a/ mowa? walla minu dhalku/ mo?

Mina aman ’taki c̱iya thulp̱a/ mo ’taa? walla mina aman ’taki dhal ’pen mo? Hili mmonyiṯẖa a’di ahe’k em buni mo tani a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Atinta palkina um aha/ kan mo? Guyi aha/ nasa guurush mo ma dhali dhalki aha/ p̱ara a’di e mo.
Dhali uni ki guyi a’di jan ’de/ mo. Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Ki jamas maja a’dan sa/? Dhali a’di ’kwar maja imahan mo? Dhali uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: A’di ta jim ma Kaysar mo be.
Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: C̱ika Kaysar to jin ta jim ma Kaysar mo ma dhali c̱ika Arumgimis to jin ta jim ma Arumgimis mo ma. Dhali uni merkin mo gom a’di mo be.
Dhali ’Kwani Sadukiyiin p̱u’dkini a’di mo, uni gun o gwo mo ki mompinuŋ kamu/ yisa di’da. Dhali uni ki doṯ a’di gwondoṯ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki:

Amanṯor Gwo, aMusa a’di ’kwarki aman gwo mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Waḵka kam gi wathi/ midi wu mo dhali dhal ashim piti mo hili diki dhal a’di a’ci mme’d mo tani wathi/ midi mii mash asha kam piti mo dhali c̱is uc̱i goma kam piti mo be.
Ikam uni ’kokini pesu/ mo be. Jin ṯwa/a/ bu’thki’da ’bom mo dhali ki a’di wuki’d mo tani a’di diki dhal a’di a’ci mo be.
Dhali jin ’kon mo p̱o/i su/ mo bu’thki’da yim mo dhali wuki’d mo si’da/ mmodiki dhal a’di a’ci mo dhali jin ’kon ma p̱o/i kwara mo nyaḵkina mii gi wakansan mo be.
Dhali unim pesu/ ’koki dhal a’di a’ci mo. Yan’ko’d mo tani a’bom si’da/ wuki’d mo.
E mompinu mo tani a’bom midi ta asha ja mo? Haali/ gwaṯẖ ’kokini pesu/ kun bu’thki a’di mo mmota a’bom buni mo be.
Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: A’di diki ta ’kup̱ gwo jin ṯẖu’thkina um mii mo ki um ’koki mish Gwo ma Arumgimis kun ’kwarkunu mo walla mom’bi’th ma Arumgimis mo?
Haali/ ki uni mini piyu/ mo ’peni mowu mo tani uni mini mash doḵ/e yisa walla minu ’koki c̱i bway mo mmomash mo si’da/. Hili uni mina e waki iman’doyu gwo mo e momis mo be.

Dhali gom gwo gi uni gun minu cuyi mis mo ’peni mowu mo tani ’kona um ki deŋ gwo e mo e gwo jin ’kwarkin ma Musa mo ’taa? e gwo gi ari cwa me’d jin on ma Arumgimis a’di gwo mo ki: Aha/ tana Arumgimis ma Ibrahiim mo dhali aha/ tana Arumgimis ma Is/hak mo dhali aha/ tana Arumgimis ma Yakuub mo?
A’di diki ta Arumgimis gom uni gun wukin mo hili gom uni gun ’kon ki e mo. Um wani imanṯẖu’th mii mana?

Dhali jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ ’peni iman’kwar to p̱u’dki’d mo dhali ciḵ gwo jin su’kkina uni ka rem ’kup̱ mo. Dhali mmonyiṯẖa a’di ki a’di thoḵki uni gwo ki ’bore/ mo tani a’di ki doṯ a’di gwo mo ki: Gwoŋḵan jana jin ’kwaru si’da/ jin ta jin ṯwa/a/ ki tiya ’baar mo?
Yesus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Jin ṯwa/a/ a’dihe/ be jin o gwo mo ki: Ciḵi um gwo mo ma. Ayy, um ’Kwani ma Israyiil mo. Tap̱a Arumgimis bana a’di ta Tap̱a Arumgimis jin ṯal ’de/ mo be.
Dhali /e mini en Tap̱a Arumgimis pini ka dum pini ’baar mo dhali ka ḵashiram pini ’baar mo dhali ki bwam pini ’baar mo dhali ki ’bi’th pini ’baar mo.
Dhali jiŋ ’ko’da ’dihe/ mo be: /E mini en amannyaḵ c̱a’b pini me’d is piniŋ gana/ mo be. Gwoŋḵana kamu/ jin ’kwarkunu mo yisa di’da jin ca’d mmobol yansan e mo.
Dhali aman’kwar to mo a’di ki o a’di gwo mo ki: /E o gwoŋ gana/ mo, Amanṯor Gwo. /E ṯori gwo ki ṯor gana/ ki a’di ṯal ’de/ mo, haali/ jaŋ kamu/ yisa di’da, hili a’di ’de/ mo be.

Mmo/en a’di ka du ’baar mo dhali ka du jin mishi gwo ’bani ’baar mo dhali ki mom’bithi ’baar mo dhali mmo/en amannyaḵ c̱a’b pini me’d is piniŋ gana/ mo tani a’di boli to ’baar mo e gun c̱inu mo mmoc̱i’th ki o’d mo dhali kun ’donu mo mmomiiya bas mo be.

Dhali ka Yesus mishki’d ki a’di thoḵki a’di gwo ki ’bore/ mo tani a’di ki o a’di gwo mo ki: /E yisa si’dkina ’peni Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo. Dhali ’peni mo yan mo tani wathin ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin ro’dki mii mo mmodoṯ a’di gwondoṯa kamu/ mo be.
Dhali ka Yesus di’d mo mmoṯor uni gwo mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo tani a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Kata i/ona iman’kwar to mo ka Ḵrisṯẖos ta Ya/ ma Dawuu’d moye?

Haala Dawuu’d ki is piti mmoshi/irrkunu a’di ki Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo tani a’di o gwo eya tente/ mo ki: Tap̱a o Tap̱am pem gwo mo ki: ’C̱a’bi /e aha/ ki me’da bim poros pem mo ntagi aha/ mina dhu ’kup̱ pini mo e bwaŋ ’kwariny cwa jin dhuna /e sho’k mo.
Dawuu’d ki is piti ki yuḵ a’di ki Tap̱a mo. Wakan a’di midi ta ya/m piti kata mo doḵ/e? Dhali adhana waambuhany ’kwani ciḵki gwo ’peni a’di ki bwaŋ ’kunyga/ mo be.

Dhali e gwom piti jin ṯora a’di uni mo tani a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Jiyi iman’kwar to ki e ki ’bore/ mo uni gun eni momaŋas ki burrinyen turga/ i is mo dhali kun eni mo jin taḵuwa taḵ ka rem ’kup̱ e mo ma suug mo
dhali mmobu’th mo kun ’boron e gu’b gi montul is mo dhali mo kun taḵuwa taḵ mo e mo jin yuḵuwa yuḵ mo,
uni gun loski gu’b gi up̱ gun wuna ikaṯẖ ki ’kolo’c mo dhali uni gun miiki mon’tho mo eya p̱or ma pije/ mo ki rash rash mo. Uni mini bu’th dhan miiwaḵ jin bol kun tiya e mo be.

Dhali a’di c̱a’bki’da ’cesh ka p̱ar ’twa/ e mo jin dhunuwa guurush mo dhali a’di p̱arki’da waambuhany ’kwani e mo mmodhuna uni aguurush e mo jin dhunuwa guurush mo. ’Kwani tana ris ka ris kun ta pa ki pa mo kun dhukina dhana guurush mo.
Dhala ’bom jin wukin ma kaṯẖim piti mo p̱u’dki’d mo dhali a’di ki dhu ushi emena guurushi su/ mo kun ta gi ’per mo, uni gun wana e ka ṯariip̱an ’de/ mo be.

Dhali a’di ki yuḵ imanciḵ a’di gwo e a’di mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ona um gwo mo ki, a’boma ha’th’ko’d yansan jin wun ma kaṯẖim piti mo tani a’di dhuki’da ris tom piti ’baar mo mmobol uni gwansan e mo kun ṯa’kki to mo e mo jin dhunuwa guurush mo be.
Haali/ uni ’baar mo ṯa’kki to mo ’peni tom buni gun ishkin ka enthus mo. Hili ayim ’pena ha’th’ko’d piti mo tani a’di dhuki’da ris to ’baar mo kun tana a’di mo gun mini ’taki kar a’di mo be.

Dhali me’d jin yakina a’di ka pije/ mo ’peni gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo tani jan ’deŋ kamu/ ’peni imanciḵ a’di gwo mo o a’di gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma, Amanṯor Gwo. Wosh gwahan wani jaro/ jarowa dhali monyaŋgi gu’b gwahan wani jaro/ jaro/ mo!
Dhala Yesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: /E mishi dhan mii gi gu’ba caaga/ gwansan kun nyaŋkunu mo? Hili wosha ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa midi di ap̱owa kamuŋ kamu/ mo jin minu ’koki ṯa’k a’cesh mo be.
Dhali me’d jin c̱a’bkina a’di e ’kuwosh Seṯuun jin di’d ka p̱ar ’twa/ ki gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo tani Buṯerus dhala Yakuub dhala Yohaan dhala Andaraawus doṯki a’di gwo ka ḵwal is mo ki:
Ṯori aman gwo mo ma, ki mii gwansan mini p̱u’d kakasja mo? Dhali ki jamas mii kun wakatinta imina to gwansani ’baar mo mmothim mo mo?
Dhala Yesus ki ṯel mii ’pen mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: ’Cunycuri mii ki is bum ki ’bore/ mo ma, ki jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ midi diki sus um mmodheres mo.
’Kwani tana ris ka ris mini iiyu/ ki gway pem mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Aha/ tana a’di mo. Dhali uni mini sus tiya ka ris mmodheres mo be.
Dhali ki um mini ciḵ gwo gom mo/as mo dhali gom gwo jin ’ce’du ’te/ mo gom mo/as mo tani dhalku/ is ki anan mo. Gom to gwansan mini mii p̱u’du/ mo. Hili ’pemen yisa minu thim naskina/ mo.

Haali/ kala kamu/ midi cu mis ap̱o/ kala kamu/ mo dhali ’peŋkuman bampaŋ kamu/ midi cu mis ap̱o/ ’peŋkuman bampaŋ kamu/ mo. Dhali adhan mony’cesh midi yiḵin is ki mo ka ris mo dhali ṯe/ midi di mo si’da/. Hili mii gwansan uni ita jasi monṯel ’pen ki isa nyor mo be.

Hili ’cunycuri mii ki is bum ki ’bore/ mo ma. Haali/ uni mini c̱i um mo e montul is mo dhali um minu dor mo e gu’b gi montul is mo dhali um mini doshi bwambor imudhiir mo dhali imaliḵ mo gom gway pem mo mmoc̱i gwo ibwambori uni mo be.
Dhali gwom ’borga/ minu mii c̱iki kal gi ’kwaniny’ceshi ’baar mo nṯwa/a/ mo be.

Dhali ki uni mini sus um mo e mo jin dwallu gwo mo dhali c̱i um wakan mo tani dhalku/ is ki anan mo nṯwa/a/ mo gom gwo jin mina umi o mo. Hili oyi a’diyin jin minu c̱i um ki mo yansan mo haali/ a’di diki ta um kun mini o gwo mo, hili Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo be.
Dhala kama kamu/ midi c̱i akam piti mmo’kosh jwa mo dhali com midi c̱i ya/ ki ’bwa/ ilu/ mo mmo’kosh mo dhali uc̱i mini cu mis ap̱o/ ikum mo dhali uni mini dhu uni mmowu mo be.
Dhali um minu shi/i e ki ’kwani ka ris mo gom gway pem mo. Hili a’di jin midi ’dim ’kup̱ mo ntagi ’pemen mo tani a’di iminu iwoṯẖ mo be.

Hili ki um mini p̱ar a’di jin ta mii jin bulabul e mo, a’di jin thumu mo e mo jin mina a’di ḵa ’taki diki di mo ba/ tani (dhalka mandeŋ gwo e mishi gwo ’ban mo) dhali yan’ko’d uni gwansan kun ’kon e Pa Yahuudiyya mo tani dhalki uni soni ’kuwosh mo ma.
Dhali dhalki a’di jin di’di ’kuŋgu’b midi diki thul ka ’cesh mo walla cic̱ gu’b piti mo mmogu toŋ kamu/ mo.
Dhali dhalki a’di jin di’d e bwam bunto midi diki doḵu/ ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo mmogu burrinyem p̱om piti mo be.
Dhali ayy/ayy/ayy gom uni gwansan kun bwaa uc̱i mo dhali gom uni gwansan kun c̱i uc̱i ako mmop̱i ka tee gwansan mo.
’Thoyi mo ma ki a’di midi diki p̱u’du/ mondiṯ mo.
Haali/ ka cim gwansan mo tani monṯo’c bwa midi di jin diki di wakan mo ’peni ka muŋ’kup̱ mo me’d jin uḵ ma Arumgimis to mo ntagi shwane/ mo ba/, dhali midi diki di ki sule/ sule/ mo be.

Dhali waḵki/ Tap̱a midi ’taki diki ’ciṯẖa/ cim gwansan bwa mo tani buye/ wathimpaŋ kamu/ minu ’taki ’koki woṯẖ mo be. Hili gom gway gi uni gun kwanykunu mo, uni gun kwanykina a’di mo tani a’di i’ciṯẖuwa cim bwa mo be.
Dhali waḵki/ wathin ’deŋ kamu/ midi o um gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma, aḴrisṯẖos a’dan mo, walla, Hili mo mo ma, a’di ac̱iṯṯaan mo tani dhalki gwom piti ki gam is mo.

Haali/ iḵrisṯẖos kun ’koki ta kuŋ gana/ mo dhali imanc̱i gwonthus mini cu mis mo dhali ṯor dhan jamas mii mo dhali dhan momer mo mmosusa susi dheres mo, waḵki/ a’di mishu mii si’da/ gom uni gun kwanykunu mo be.
Hili ’cunycuri is bum ki ’bore/ mo. Aha/ ṯorkina um aris to gwansani ’baar mo nṯwa/a/ mo be.
Hili ka tee gwansan mo ’ko’di monṯo’c bwa mo tani atente/ midi dhurum mo mo dhali appe midi diki c̱i moŋkush piti mo be.
Dhali arisa culi ’baar mo mini ṯa’k mo ’peni momis mo dhali mom’bi’th kun ’kon e momis mo tani minu pir is mo be.
Dhali yan’ko’d uni mini p̱ar Ya/ gi ’Kwani e mo mmop̱u’du/ mo e bwaaraḵ ka dhan mom’bi’th mo dhali ki monyca mo be.

Dhali yan’ko’d a’di midi hash iman’doyu gwom piti mo dhali tul kum piti is kun kwanykunu mo ’peni mony’cesh kun ’kona shem ’pena bi idoŋon mo ’peni mo jin din ma ’cesh ’kup̱ mo ntagi mo jin dina momis ’kup̱ mo be.
’Peni gwo gi cwamp̱u/ da/ari a’di mo dhali mishi miim piti mo. Me’d jin lu/kina a’di abim piti mo mmo’ta’dama’ta’dam mo dhali dhu jip̱in this mo tani um ki mish mo mo ki moyurantee ’dishi’d mo be.
Wakan si’da/ waḵki/ um ki p̱ar aris to gwansan e mo mmobu’th mo mo tani um ki mish mo mo ki a’di ’dishki’d mo, e ’twaŋkal hila/ mo be.
Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki ’kwani ma nyaḵum yil gwansan mini ’koki pe mo nṯwa/a/, nṯwa/a/ ka ris to gwansan mini bu’th mo mo be.
Momis dhali mony’cesh mini pe mo tani hili gwom pem midi diki pe mo be.
Hili ka tente/ c̱aan mo walla ki mo c̱aan mo tani a’di dina wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ ki mish mo walla iman’doyu gwo kun ’kon e momis mo walla Ya/ si’da/ mo, hili jasi Com a’di ’de/ mo be.
’Cunycuri is bum ki ’bore/ mo ma dhali timi mo mo ma dhali ’thoyi mo ma, haali/ um ’koki mish mo mo atente/ jin mina mo p̱u’du/ mo be.

A’di mina e waki wathi/ jin ya yilkina/ mo. Me’d jin dhalkina a’di pam piti ’pen mo tani dhali a’di dhu c̱iŋkinam piti mo mmohil mo mo isi ka ṯu’c piti ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mo. Dhali a’di ki ḵan amantim ’twaŋkal gu’b gwo mo mmotim mo mo be.
Timi mo mo ma wakan — haali/ um ’koki mish mo mo jin mina com gu’bi p̱u’du/ mo. A’di wari midi ta mom’pimpili/ mo walla mombwam/e mo walla mo kun gwon ma dhoŋgola ŋwa mo walla mon’thamo/ mo.
Hili isi ciki/ a’di midi p̱u’du/ ki jahanne/ mo dhali gam um ki um mala e mo be.
Dhali a’di jin ṯorka/ um mo tani miga/ ṯor ki ’kwani ’baar mo ki: Timi mo mo ma.

Dhali acim boc̱kini su/ nṯwa/a/ ka cim gi Mompe’kup̱anyolos mo dhali ayuḵ jin tulu ’kup̱ mo gi maaŋḵuthu’d jin miinu ki dar ga cumaṯ mo. Dhali igasiis kun can dhali iman’kwar to mo uni ŋap̱ki bway mo mmobu’th a’di ki kup̱ mo dhali ’kosh a’di jwa mo
haali/ uni o gwo mo ki: Yisa ka tul ’kup̱ yan jin yuḵuwa yuḵ mo yisa hili isi ciki/ adulaṯṯ mina ’kwani ishwa mo be.

Dhali ki a’di diki’d e Pam Beeṯaniya e gu’b ma Simaan jin ’kosha monthus mo tani ki a’di c̱a’bki’da tharabeesa mo tani a’boma kamu/ p̱u’dki’d mo jin taki’d gi turaŋ gasaas jin ta gi kush mo jin din ma yina p̱i’dnaŋ gana/ nycine/ mo, jin ’bitha yol she/ ki ’bi’th mo. Dhala yim ki ’ce’d tura mo dhali wol a’di e ’kup̱ ma Yesus mo be.
Hili ’kwanin tiya ’kokini mun mo kun deḵkin ma nyor mo e is buni mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Atinta shinu ayina p̱i’dnaŋ gana/ yan isa ’cesh kan mo?
Haali/ ayina p̱i’dna/ yan minu ’taki yol ka riyaal iss ’kwanimpa ka ’kume’d mo dhali c̱iki ’kwani kun hatha’ko’d mo. Dhali uni ki ruḵa yim ki gwo mo be.
Hila Yesus o gwo mo ki: Dhalka yim mo ma. Atinta ṯoca um ayim bwa mo? Ayim miiki tony jaro/ gom aha/ mo.
Haali/ um isa yempa/ um tan gi ’kwani kun hatha’ko’d kun nyaḵ ’ko ki um mo, dhali ki yilan tiya jin ona bwa um mo tani um ki mish uni tom ’boron mii mo. Hili um mini ’koki ta gi aha/ isa yempa/ mo.
Ayim mii a’di jin misha a’di mii mo. Ayim ’koshki aha/ buŋgwar is pem nṯwa/a/ mo gom kan jin minu kan aha/ mo be.
Dhali ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: E mo yin jin minu c̱i gwom ’borga/ e mony’ceshi ’baar mo tani a’di jin miikin ma yim mo tani minu ṯor mo mmokaa yim e mo be.
Dhali yan’ko’d Yahuusa Isḵariyuuṯi a’di jin ’dap̱ tiya ’twa/ ka ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo tani a’di yaki’d mo e igasiis kun can mo mmothoson gwo mo mmo’ciṯẖ a’di is ki gwo mo e uni mo be.
Dhali ki uni ciḵki gwo mo tani uni ’kunya bwa ki ’kuny mo dhali o gwo is mo mmoc̱iki a’di aguurush mo. Dhali a’di ŋap̱ki embula ’borgaŋ gana/ mo mmo’ciṯẖ a’di is ki gwo mo be.

Dhali ka cim jin ṯwa/a/ gi maaŋḵuthu’d jin miinu ki dar ga cumaṯ mo ki uni ’ciṯẖki ari ḵa’bal ’kus mo gom Mompe’kup̱anyolos mo tani imanciḵ a’di gwo oki a’di gwo mo ki: Ki mana o /e bwa jin mina aman ii mo dhali thoson to mo gom /e mo mmoshwa ki Mompe’kup̱anyolos mo?
Dhali a’di hashki imanciḵ a’di gwo isu/ mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Iiku/ i dhan ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo dhali wathi/ jin ḵali dhan dhur yi’de/ midi gam um ’kup̱ mo. Baṯẖi a’di nsho’k mo ma.

Dhali e mo yin jin mina a’di cic̱ mo tani oyi com gu’b gwo mo ki: Amanṯor Gwo o ki: Mane gu’b jin midi ta gu’b yilkina/ gom aha/ mo jin miga/ shwa to ka cim gi Mompe’kup̱anyolos nyaḵki imanciḵ gwom pem mo?
Dhali a’di midi ṯor um adhan gu’ba beega/ mo jin nyaŋu ka maḵamp̱o/ ap̱owa kamu/ mo, jin isha to ki korom korom mo dhali jin thosonkunu mo. E mun mo tani thosoni to mo ma gom ana mo.
Dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo iikin mo dhali p̱u’d mo e ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo dhali gam a’di me’d jin ṯorkina a’di uni gwo mo. Dhali uni thosonki to mo gom Mompe’kup̱anyolos mo be.
Dhali ki mo ta mom’pimpili/ mo tani a’di p̱u’dki’d nyaḵki kum piti kun ’koni ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo.

Dhali ki uni ’kokina tharabeesa mo mmoshwa to mo tani Yesus ki o gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: Jan ṯal ’de/ ’peni um midi ’ciṯẖ aha/ is ki gwo mo, a’din ’de/ jin nyaḵki to shwa ki aha/ mo be.
Dhali uni ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmoḵal bwan diṯi’d mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ka baṯẖ ’pen ka rem ’kup̱ mo ki: A/aha/ ’taa?
A’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: A’di ta jin ṯal ’de/ ’peni um kun ’koni ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo, a’di jin ’thup̱ki maaŋḵuthu’d nyaḵki aha/ eya sahana ’de/ mo be.

Haali/ Ya/ gi ’Kwani yaki’d mo me’d gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo gom a’di mo, hili wayyi e wathi/ jin ’ciṯẖki Ya/ gi ’Kwani is ki gwo mo. A’di midi ’taki ’bor ki isi ’bor gana/ mo gom wathi/ yansan mo waḵki/ a’di minu ’taki ’koki dho’th mo be.

Dhali ki uni ’kokin mo mmoshwa to mo tani a’di ki bu’th maaŋḵuthu’d mo dhali ’bora ’bor bwa i is mo dhali ’ce’d a’di mo dhali c̱iki uni mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Budhi a’di yansan mo ma. A’di ta is pem mo be.
Dhali a’di ki budha ḵubbaaya mo, dhali ki a’di c̱iki mom’bora ’bor bwa i is mo tani a’di ki c̱iki uni mo dhali uni ’baar mo p̱iki a’di mo be.
Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: A’di yansan ta’da abas pem gi gwo jin gamu me’d jin ta jin this mo a’di jin wolki’d gom ’kwani ka ris mo be.
Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki aha/ mina diki p̱i yiman maman cwa doḵ/e mo ntaga tee jin miga/ p̱i a’di jin ta jin this e Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
Dhali ki uni yuḵki gway mo tani uni iikin ka pije/ mo e ’kuwosh Seṯuun mo.
Dhala Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Umi ’baar mo mini ṯa’k mo. Haali/ a’di ’kwarkunu mo ki: Aha/ mina ’kosha manhil ḵa’bal mo dhali ḵa’bal minu c̱eker bwa mo be.
Hili ŋ’ko’d mo tani ki aha/ minu cuyu mis mo doḵ/e tani aha/ mina ya iṯwa/a/ ki um e Pany Jaliil mo be.
Buṯerus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Bahili waḵki/ uni gwansani ’baar mo mini ṯa’k mo tani aha/ mina diki biṯ mo be.
Dhala Yesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora /e gwo mo ki mon’thiny yansan shwane/ mo nṯwa/a/ ka dhoŋgola ŋwa diki ko e me’di su/ mo naskina/ tani /e mini waṯ aha/ gway me’di kwara mo be.
Hili a’di oki gwo ka du jin daradar mo ki: Waḵki/ aha/ mina mii wu mo nyaḵki /e mo tani aha/ mina diki waṯ /e gway mo. Dhali uni ’baar mo nyaḵki o ’twan ṯal ’de/ mo be.
Dhali uni iikin mo e mo jin yuḵu gway ka Jaṯẖsemaani mo. Dhali a’di ki o imanciḵ a’di gwo gwo mo ki: ’Koyi imahan mo ma. Aha/ ki ya mo dhali ’tho mo.
Dhali a’di ki susa Buṯerus mo dhala Yakuub mo dhala Yohaan mo dhali mii ma c̱is ṯelki a’di ’pen mo mmobu’th a’di kagahara mo dhali bwa jin ṯocu ’kus si’da/ mo be.
Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Aḵashiram pem diṯa bwa ki diṯ kagahara mo, ma isi kan mmowu moyi. ’Koyi imahan mo ma dhali timi mo mo mmo’ko ki e i’kup̱ mo.
Dhali mmoyakina a’di mo mmothoṯẖ is ari’ceenne/ mo tani a’di biṯki’da ’cesh mo dhali ’tho mo waḵki/ a’di minu ’taki mish mii mo tani ki mo yan midi ’taki ya pe a’di mo.
Dhali a’di o gwo mo ki: Abba Ababa. Aris to ’baar mo mishu mii ki /e mo. Ḵalka ḵubbaaya yan ’peni aha/ mo ma. Hili a’di yisa jin oyaa/ bwa, hili a’di jin ta bwam pini mo be.
Dhali a’di p̱u’dki’d mo dhali gam uni ki uni ishki e mo dhali a’di ki owa Buṯerus gwo mo ki: Simaan, A/e ishki e kan mo? Bunya/ mina /e diki tim mo mo ka tenten ’de/ mmodi ki e i’kup̱ mo?
Timi mo mo ma dhali ’koyi ki e i’kup̱ mo dhali ’thoyi mo, ki um mini ’koki cic̱ mo e mo jin palu mo. Shi/in ka jiŋ gana/ a’di ona bwa mo tani hili buŋgwar is a’di ihatha’ko’d ki ha’th mo be.
Dhali doḵ/e a’di yaki’d mo dhali ’tho mo mmorash jasi gwon ṯal ’de/ e mo.
Dhali doḵ/e a’di p̱u’dki’d mo dhali gam uni ki uni ishki e mo haali/ em buni ṯo’dki uni is mo dhali uni ’koki mish gwo jin mina uni thoḵ a’di mo be.

Dhali me’di kwara mo doḵ/e tani a’di p̱u’dki’di uni mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: A/um ’kon mo mmo/ish e kan mo dhali bu’th mosi/is bum mo? A’di ’koshi jwa mo ba/. Mo p̱u’du’d mo. Ya/ gi ’Kwani a’di ’ciṯẖkunu is ki gwo mo e me’d gi ’kwani kun ta imanmii miinthus mo be.
Cuyi mis mo. Dhalki ana iina mo. Hila uma? Aman’ciṯẖaa/ is ki gwo p̱u’dki’d hila/ mo be.

Dhali ki jahanne/ ki a’di di’di mmo/o gwo mo naskina/ mo tani Yahuusa p̱u’dki’d mo, a’di jin ’dap̱ tiya ’twa/ ka ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo dhali a’di suski’da waambuhany ’kwani nyaḵki a’di mo ki gandala turga/ ime’d mo dhali cwa mo, ’peni igasiis kun can mo dhali iman’kwar to mo dhali ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ mo be.
Dhali a’di jin ’ciṯẖki a’di is ki gwo mo c̱iki uni jamas mii mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Jan ṯal ’de/ jin miga/ p̱i ’twa/ mo tani a’di ta wathi/ mo. Budhi a’di mo dhali susi a’di ki ’dantar mo.
Dhali ki a’di p̱u’dki’d mo tani a’di ki ya a’di ki jahanne/ mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Tap̱a. Dhali a’di ki p̱i a’di ’twa/ mo be.
Dhali uni ’baar mo ki dhu me’d buni ap̱o/ a’di mo dhali bu’th a’di mo.
Hili jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ ’peni uni gwansan kun doshkin ki ’dishe/ mo tani a’di ki buḵ gandala turgam piti mo dhali ruṯẖun c̱iŋkina/ ma gasiis jin ca’d mo dhali ’ciṯẖ a’di ’cem piti mo be.
Dhala Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: A/um iiyin ka pije/ mmobu’th aha/ ki gandala turga/ ime’d mo dhali ki cwa mo, me’d mii jin miinu ap̱o/ wathin ’di/ mo?
Ka tee kun baṯẖani ’ko’d mo tani aha/ dikina mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo mmoṯor um gwo mo dhali um ’koki bu’th aha/ mo be. Hili dhalki Gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo thimu mo.
Dhali uni ’baar mo dhalki a’di me’d mo dhali so mo be.
Dhali wathin dhuruca kamu/ baṯẖki a’di nsho’k mo ki dar gi toŋ kamu/ i is mo, jasi burrinyen dhiny e jin ’kamkina a’di i is mo, dhali uni ki bu’th a’di mo.
Hili a’di dhalki burrinyen dhiny e mo dhali gus is ’te/ mo ki jasi burrinye/ jin hitha a’di i empa’d mo be.
Dhali uni ki susa Yesus eya gasiis jin ca’d mo. Dhali igasiis kun cani ’baar mo dhali ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ mo dhali iman’kwar to mo uni tulki is mo be.
Dhala Buṯerus baṯẖki a’di nsho’k ’pena dhana/ mo. A’di ki ya ki sule/ e bwaagoŋ ma gasiis jin ca’d mo. Dhali a’di ki nyaḵ c̱a’b ki imanji mo mo dhali sam is piti i o’d mo be.
Dhali igasiis kun can dhali ’kwani gi montul is buni ’baar mo uni ŋap̱ki gwo mo mmo/o ap̱owa Yesus mo mmokar a’di mmowu mo tani hili uni ’koki gam ton ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ mo be.
Haali/ ’kwani tana ris ka ris kun ’ce’dki a’di gwo ap̱o/ mo dhali gwom buni gun ’ce’dkina uni a’di i is mo tani uni ’konuki gam me’d mo be.
Dhali kun tiya doshkin ki mis mo dhali ’ce’d a’di gwo ap̱o/ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki:

Aman ciḵkina gwo jin ona a’di mo ki: Aha/ mina ’kosh gu’b gi mondheleladhelel yansan mo, a’di jin nyaŋkunu ki me’d mo, dhali ka cim kwara mo tani aha/ mina nyaŋ jaŋ kamu/ jin ’konuki nyaŋ ki me’d mo be.
Isi gwom buni jin ’ce’da uni kan mo tani yisa gamu me’d mowa.
Dhala gasiis jin ca’d doshki’d ki mis mo e bwaman uni mo dhali doṯa Yesus gwo mo ki: A/e bunya/ diki ’de’k ’twaŋ kamu/ mo mmothoḵ gwo kana? Gwo gi wakatinta i/ona ’kwani gwansan ap̱o e mo?
Hili a’di c̱a’bki’d ki shwam mo dhali yisa thoḵ ’twaŋ kamuwa. Dhala gasiis jin ca’d doḵ/e ki doṯ a’di gwo mo ki: A/e tana Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta Ya/ gi A’di jin Maŋu mowa?
Dhala Yesus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Aha/ tana a’di mo, dhali /e mini p̱ar Ya/ gi ’Kwani e mo mmoc̱a’b ka bim poros gi mom’bi’th mo dhali mmodoḵu/ ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo e bwaaraḵ ’peni momis mo be.
Dhala gasiis jin ca’d dherki burrinyem p̱om piti bwa mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Katinta ic̱orkina ana gwo mo jin minu mii o mo?
Um ciḵki a’di walki gwo sor mo. Gwo jin gama um me’d mo wakata mo? Dhali uni ’baar mo waḵki a’di mo mmo/o ki a’di ha me’d mmowu mo be.

Dhali kun tiya ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmo’taḵ a’di manya/ i is mo dhali mmokum a’di bwam/em piti mo dhali dor a’di mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Oyi gwo is mo ma. Dhali mmodora uniya dor ki me’d buni mo tani uni kun ta imanji mo mo bu’thki a’di mo be.
Dhala Buṯerus diki’d ka luŋgu’b mo e bwam ma goŋ mo, dhali nyarany c̱iŋkinan ’deŋ kamu/ ’peni jim ma gasiis jin ca’d mo tani a’di p̱u’dki’d mo.
Dhali mmonyiṯẖkina a’diya Buṯerus mo mmosam is piti i o’d mo tani ayim ḵu’thki a’di ki e mo dhali o gwo mo ki: /E si’da/ nyaḵki di ki wathi/ gi Pa Naasira yan jin ta’da Yesus mo.

Hili a’di waṯki gwo mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Aha/ mola a’di mo walla ’pemen gwom pini jin ona /e mo tani a’di molka/ ’ban mo. Dhali a’di ki ya ka pije/ ki ’twaŋkala lambalany mo. Dhala dhoŋgola ŋwa gwoki’d mo be.
Dhali nyarany c̱iŋkina/ p̱arki a’di e mo dhali ṯel mii ’pen mo mmo/o a’di gwo mo doḵ/e e uni gwansan kun doshkin ki ’dishe/ mo ki: Wathi/ yansan ta jan ṯal ’de/ ’peni uni mo be.

Dhali doḵ/e a’di waṯki gwo mo. Dhali yan’ko’d doḵ/e ari’ceenne/ mo tani uni gwansan kun doshkin ki ’dishe/ mo tani ona Buṯerus gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana e ta jan ṯal ’de/ ’peni uni mo haali e ta ji gi Pany Jaliil mo be.
Hili a’di ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmojee is piti jwa mo ki gwo jin thulkina a’di me’da p̱o/ mo, mmo/o gwo mo ki: Aha/ dinaki mish wathi/ yan mo, a’di jin okina um mo.

Dhali ki jahanne/ adhoŋgola ŋwa gwoki e me’di su/ mo. Dhala Buṯerus kana gwo e mo, ma gwo yin jin on ma Yesus a’di mo ki: Nṯwa/a/ ka dhoŋgola ŋwa diki ko e mo me’di su/ mo tani /e mini waṯ aha/ gway me’di kwara mo. Dhali ki a’di di’d mmoka gwo e ’baar mo ka baṯẖ ’pen mo tani a’di ’tul ma du mo dhali a’di gwoki’d ki jabu’th mo be.

Dhali ki jahanne/ ki mo ta mon’thamo/ mo tani igasiis kun can mo dhali ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ mo dhali iman’kwar to mo dhali aris ’kwani gi montul is buni mo tani uni tulki is mo mmoganan gwo ’kup̱ mo. Dhali uni ki deḵa Yesus mo dhali sus a’di mo mmoc̱ika Bilaaṯus mo be.
Dhala Bilaaṯus ki doṯ a’di gwo mo ki: Ki /e de itana maliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo de? Dhali a’di ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: /E si’da/ on wakansan mo be.
Dhali igasiis kun can uni yerki a’di is ki gway ki to ka ris mo.
Dhala Bilaaṯus ki doṯ a’di mo doḵ/e ki: /E bunya/ mini diki thoḵ ’twaŋ kamu/ mo ’taa? Hili ma, ama’diny gwo wana risa kun okina uni ap̱o e mo.
Hila Yesus diki thoḵ a’di gwon ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ mo. Gom mii gi wakan mo tani aBilaaṯus merki’d mo be.
Dhali ki mii jin tuluwa tul ’kup̱ mo tani miim piti isa yempa/ ta mii mmo’cuḵki uni jan ’de/ ’peni ’kwani habuus mo a’di jin doṯkina uni mo be.
Dhali wathi/ di’d jin yuḵkunu gway ka Baraabas mo jin diki’di bwam uni eya sijin mo, a’di jin ’koshki’da mee mo e mii jin miinu gom gwo jin onuwa ’cesh gom bampa/ mo be.
Dhala waambuhany ’kwani p̱u’dkin mo dhali ṯel mii ’pen mo mmodoṯa Bilaaṯus gwo mo mmomii to jin miina a’di isa yempa/ gom uni mo.
Dhali a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Um ŋap̱ki aha/ mmo’cuḵki um aMaliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo ’taa?
Haali/ a’di nyiṯẖki dhap̱an jin takina igasiis kun can mo gom a’di mo mmoc̱i a’di wakan mo.
Hili igasiis kun can c̱i’thkina waambuhany ’kwani is ki mii mo ki a’di midi ’cuḵki uni aBaraabas mo ’te/.
Dhala Bilaaṯus ki o uni gwo mo doḵ/e ki: Dhali aha/ mina miiya ta ki wathi/ jin yuḵa um ka Maliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo?
Dhali uni cuukin kagahara mo doḵ/e ki: ’Koshi a’di ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo.
Dhala Bilaaṯus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Gomatinta sa/? Tonthus gi wakatinta imiikina a’di mo? Hili uni ’baar mo ḵumki cuuwa/ mo ki nyanye/ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: ’Koshi a’di ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo.

Wakan Bilaaṯus mmodikina a’di gwo ibwa mo mmoṯeya waambuhany ’kwani ki gwo mo tani a’di ki ’cuḵki uni aBaraabas mo dhali ki a’di dorki’da Yesus ki yis bip̱ mo tani a’di ki c̱iki a’di ki uni mo mmo’kosh ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo be.
Dhali i/askar ki sus a’di mo e bwam mo ma mudhiir mo, a’di jin ta gu’b jin c̱a’ba a’di nycine/ mo. Dhali uni ki yuḵ i/askari ’baar mo ka tul ’kup̱ mo.
Dhali uni ki hi’thki a’di burrinyen duḵ is mo jin ta jam p̱o/ mo dhali uni ki ṯo’d toŋ’kup̱ ’pena ’de/ mo mmokar a’di i’kup̱ mo be.
Dhali uni ki ṯel mii ’pen mo mmothe a’di me’d mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Hayy Maliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo.
Dhali uni ki dor a’di ’kup̱ ki cwa mo dhali ’taḵ a’di manya/ i is mo dhali uni ki luŋ ki jiŋ ’kup̱a ’dup̱uni bwambori a’di mo mmowu is ka ’cesh mo.

Dhali ki uni miiki a’di ka maḵ mo tani uni ki ’cuḵ a’di burrinyen duḵ is jin ta jam p̱o/ mo dhali uni ki hi’thki a’di burrinyem piti i is mo. Dhali uni ki sus a’di ka pije/ mo mmo’kosh ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo be.
Dhali uni ki budha Simaan gi Paŋ Kerawaan ki ’bi’th mo a’di jin ta CoAlaksandarus mo dhala Rup̱us mo, a’di jin yaki yampe mo, a’di jin yayi’d ’peni bampa/ mo, mmoḵal cwany’ciṯẖan dhul piti mo.
Dhali uni suski a’di mo e mo jin yuḵu gway ka Gulguṯẖa mo (jin ta ’pemen gwo jin onu mo ki: mo ma simaŋ ’kup̱ mo be. )
Dhali uni c̱iki a’di yimana mura’th jin ’koshu e ki yiman cwa jin ta’da murr mo be. Hili a’di diki bu’th a’di mo be.

Dhali uni ’koshki a’di ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo dhali uni ki ḵwa/ burrinyem piti bwa mo e bwam uni mo mmoṯa’k to mo gom uni mo mmopi gwo ’pen ka pije/ mo, gom to jin mina uni ’baar mo ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ ’taki bu’th mo be.
Dhali ki mo ta’da tente/ pedoŋon mo tani uni ’koshki a’di ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo be.
Dhali gwo jin onu ap̱o/ a’di jin ’kwarkunu mo, a’di jin deŋkunu e mo tani o’d ka: Maliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo be.
Dhali nyaḵki a’di mo tani uni ki ’kosh ’kwanin ’di/ isu/ ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo, jan ṯal ’de/ ki me’da bim poros piti mo dhali jaŋ kamu/ ki me’da biny cam piti mo be.
Dhali Gwo ma Arumgimis jin ’kwarkunu mo thimkunu mo, a’di jin o gwo mo ki: A’di karkunu mo nyaḵki imandhaŋ gwo mo.

Dhali uni gwansan kun iikin ki iimpe mo tani uni c̱iki a’di gura/ mo dhali pir ’kup̱ buni mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Ayy. /E jin mini ’taki ’kosh gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo dhali nyaŋ a’di ka cim kwara mo tani
woṯẖi/ is pini mo ma, dhali thulu/ ka ’cesh ’pena p̱o/ cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo.
Wakan si’da/ igasiis kun can miiki a’di ka maḵ mo ka rem ’kup̱ nyaḵki iman’kwar to mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: A’di mishi tiya woṯẖ mo tani hili a’di molki is piti woṯẖ moyi.

Dhalka Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Maliḵ gi ’Kwani ma Israyiil thulu’d ka ’cesh shwane’dan ’pena p̱o/ cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo ki ana mina p̱ar e mo dhali gam gwo is mo. Dhali uni gwansan kun nyaḵkunu ’kosh ki a’di ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo tani uni si’da/ sorki a’di mo be.
Dhali ka tente/ p̱u’dki’di bwaŋ ’kup̱ mo tani adhan mondhurumi’d p̱u’dki’d ap̱o/ mony’ceshi ’baar mo ntaga tente/ ibum ’ban mo be.

Dhali ka tente/ ’koni kwara mo tani Yesus cuuki’d ki dhan ’twa/ jin caaca mo ki: Iluwi, Iluwi, lama sabaktani, a’di jin ta ’pemen gwo jin onu ka: Arumgimis pem, Arumgimis pem, atinta dhalkina /e aha/ ’pen kan mo?
Dhali unin tiya kun doshkin ki ’dishe/ ciḵki a’di mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma. A’di yuḵki’da Iliyya mo be.

Dhali jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ guski’d mo dhali ’tu’da lip̱a/ ki yiman tom ’pac̱a’d mo mmokar a’di e cwa mo dhali c̱iki a’di mmop̱i mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: C̱ora ma. Dhalki ana p̱ara e mo waḵki/ Iliyya midi p̱u’du/ mo mmo’cuḵ a’di ka ’cesh mo.
Dhala Yesus cuuki’d kagahara mo dhali a’di ki c̱i shi/in piti jiŋ ’ko’d mo be.
Dhali burrinye/ jin di’d e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo tani a’di dherkunu bwa mo ka ’ban su/ mo ’peni buŋ’kup̱ mo ntagi bum’pen mo be.

Dhali ka mancil ma askar iss ’kwanimpa imudhe’d, a’di jin doshki’d ka ḵarambuye/ i a’di mo tani p̱arki a’di e mo mmoko wakan mo dhali mmoc̱i shi/in piti jiŋ ’ko’d mo tani a’di ki o gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ wathi/ yansan ta Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo be.

Dhali up̱ ’kokin mo mmun si’da/ mo kun hilki mo mo ’pena dhana/ mo. Uni gun ’koni bwaman uni mo tani ta iMariyam Magdaliyya mo dhala Mariyam jin ta KoYakuub mo jin ta a’di jin ta dhuru’c mo dhala Yusi mo dhala Saluuma mo be.
Uni gun baṯẖki a’di nsho’k mo me’d jin dikina a’di e Pany Jaliil mo dhali mii a’di to mo. Dhali up̱ tana ris ka ris si’da/ kun p̱u’dkin mo kun nyaḵki ii ki a’di mo e Pa Urushaliim mo be.
Dhali ki mom’pimpili/ p̱u’dki’d mo me’d jin tana a’di atee jin Thosonkunu to mo tani a’di jin ta’da tee jin ṯwa/a/ ka cim ma pesu/ mo tani

aYuusup̱ gi Pa Arraama a’di jin taḵu mo jin ta jan ṯal ’de/ gi montul is buni mo, a’di ki is piti si’da/ jin c̱orki Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo, a’di bu’thki’da du mo dhali yaa Bilaaṯus mo dhali doṯ a’di gwo mo gom buŋgwar is ma Yesus mo be.

Dhala Bilaaṯus merki’d mo waḵki/ a’di midi ’taki wu ki jahanne/ kan mo. Dhali a’di ki yuḵa mancil ma askar iss ’kwanimpa imudhe’d mo mmodoṯ a’di gwo mo waḵki/ a’di wuki’d hila/ mo walla a’di kap̱ki wu mo.
Dhali ki a’di da/arki gwo ’pena mancil ma askar iss ’kwanimpa imudhe’d mo gom jwa jin wukina a’di mo tani a’di ki dhala Yuusup̱ bway mo mmoḵal buŋgwar is piti mo be.

Dhali a’di yolki burrinyen dhiny e jin kanuwa kan mo dhali a’di ki thul a’di ka ’cesh mo dhali ’tham a’di is ki burrinyen dhiny e jin kanuwa kan mo dhali ’thi a’di mo e jis wosh jin ’kolkunu mo dhali ’daŋkal dhan wosha caaga/ mo mmomu’th ’twaman jis jwa ’twa/ mo be.
Mariyam Magdaliyya dhala Mariyam jin ta KoYusi p̱arki mo e mo, mo jin ’thikunu a’di nycine/ mo be.
Dhali ka cima pesu/ peki’d mo tani aMariyam Magdaliyya dhala Mariyam jin ta KoYakuub mo dhala Saluuma mo uni yolki to kun ḵuyi mo ki ḵuy mo, wakan ki uni mini ii mo dhali ’koshki a’di i is mo be.
Dhali ki mo ta mon’thamo/ ka tee jin ṯwa/a/ ga dhas mo tani uni iikin mo e moŋ’kup̱aje mo ka tente/ sulki’d mo be.
Dhali uni ’kokin mo mmo/o gwo ka rem ’kup̱ mo ki: Kaja sa/ imidi ḵa’cki ana wosh ’peni ’twaman jis jwa mo?
Dhali uni hilki mo ’kup̱ ki mis mo dhali uni p̱arki wosh e mo mmo’daŋkalkunu a’di ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo haali/ a’di caaca mo be.
Dhali uni cic̱ki bwaman jis jwa mo dhali uni p̱arki wathin dhuruca kamu/ e mo mmoc̱a’bki me’da bim poros mo mmohi’th burrinye/ jin c̱a’bki bany bany mo dhali uni merkin mo.

Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Dhalku/ ki mer mo. Um ŋap̱kina Yesus gi Pa Naasira mo, a’di jin ’koshkunu jwa mo ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo. A’di cuki mis mo be. A’di diki di imahan mo be. Hili mo mo ma, mo jin karkina uni a’di nycine/ mo.
Hili iiku/ mo dhali ṯor imanciḵ a’di gwo gwo mo dhala Buṯerus si’da/ ki a’di midi ya iṯwa/a/ ki um e Pany Jaliil mo. Dhali e mun mo tani um mini p̱ar a’di e mo me’d gwo jin ṯorkina a’di um mo be.

Dhali uni iikin mo dhali so ka ŋwac̱a/ ’peni moŋ’kup̱aje mo haali/ mo jin deenu is mo dhali momer mo p̱u’dki’d ap̱o/ uni mo be, dhali uni ’koki o gwoŋ kamu/ ṯal ’de/ mo ki wathiŋ kamu/ mo haali/ uni ḵo/ki is mo be.
Dhali ki a’di cukunu mis mo ka’tum ka cim jin ṯwa/a/ ka dhas yan mo tani a’di piki’da Mariyam Magdaliyya i is nṯwa/a/ mo a’di jin urkina a’di aruma ’cesh thusi pesu/ ka pije/ mo be.
Ayim yaki’d mo dhali ṯor to gwansan ki uni gwansan kun nyaḵki ’ko ki a’di mo ki uni ’kokin mo mmo’ko ki bwan diṯin mo dhali mmoko mo be.
Hili ki uni ciḵki gwo ki a’di diki’d ki e mo dhali mish ma yim mo tani uni ’koki gam gwom piti is mo be.
Dhali yan’ko’d mo tani a’di piki unin sun tiya i is mo ki jamasa kamu/ mo me’d jin iikina uni ibway mo mmo/ii bampa/ mo.
Dhali uni iikin ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo dhali ṯor aris to gwansan ki ’kwani ’baar mo. Hili uni ’koki gam gwom buni is mo be.

Dhali yan’ko’d mo tani a’di ki pi uni ’kume’d i’ce’dka ’de/ i is uni ’cena mo me’d jin ’kokina uni eya tharabeesa mo mmoshwa to mo. Dhali a’di ki ḵucur uni ki gwo mo gom gwom buni gun ’kona uni ki gam is mo dhali goma dum buni kun ’bitha’bi’th mo haali/ uni ’koki gam gwo gi uni gwansan is mo uni kun p̱arki a’di e mo ’ko’di pim piti jin piyunu a’di mo be.
Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Iiku/ mo e mony’ceshi ’baar mo dhali c̱i gwom ’borga/ eya ris ’kwani ’baar mo kun uḵkunu mo.
I/a’di jin midi gam gwo is mo dhali minu mii ki yi’de/ mo tani a’di iminu iwoṯẖ mo be. Hili a’di jin diki gam gwo is mo tani a’di minu waḵ mo be.
Dhali jamas mii gwansan mini baṯẖ uni gwansan kun gam gwo is mo: Ki gway pem mo tani uni mini ura ruma ’cesh ka pije/ mo dhali uni mini wal ’twa/ ki ’twan thisa tiya mo be.

Uni mini bu’th tasha/ mo. Dhali waḵki/ uni mini p̱i ton tiya kun ’kon ma ṯi’di cine/ mo tani a’di midi diki shi/ uni is mo be. Uni mini dhu me’d buni ap̱o/ uni gun ’ba’thkin mo, dhali uni minu wac̱ mo be.
Dhali yan’ko’d wakan Tap̱a Yesus ’ko’di a’di ṯorki gwo e uni mo tani a’di bu’thkunu mo bway momis mo dhali di’d mo mmoc̱a’b ka bim poros ma Arumgimis mo.
Dhali uni iikin mo mmoc̱i gwo mo eya ris mo ’baar mo dhali Tap̱a diki’d mo mmonyaḵka ṯu’c mii ki uni mo dhali mmo’da/ki uni gwo kun c̱ina uni sho’k mo ki jamas mii kun baṯẖkunu mo be. Amen
Haali/ me’d ’kwani ka ris kun bu’thki gwo mo mmotul gwo ’kup mo ka baṯẖ ’pen mo, gwo jin thimkunu mo e bwam ana mo,
jasi me’d uni kun c̱ikunu ana mo ki uni gwansan ’peni ka muŋ’kup̱ mo kun ta iman/o gwo ki e mo dhali imanmii gwo mo tani

a’di ṯoshka/ ki a’di ’boro’d gom aha/ si’da/ mo mmobaṯẖa aris to gwansan ki ’dishe/ mo haali/ goma cim gunn isa gush mo mmo’kwar uni ka roṯẖam p̱o/ mo gom /e mo /e jin tana Ṯẖawup̱iilus jin ta jim ’borga/ mo
ki /e mini mish gwoŋ gana/ mo gom gwo gi to gwansan kun ṯorkunu /e mo be.

Dhali ka tee ma Hirodus jin ta’da maliḵ gi Pa Yahuudiyya mo tani agasiisa kamu/ diki’d mo jin yuḵu gway ka Sakariyya mo. A’di ta’da awaḵ ’peni ’kwani ma Abiyya mo. Dhali a’di ta’d gi ashim piti ’peni i’bwa/ ma Haruun mo dhali gway ma yim yuḵu ka Ilisabaaṯ mo be.
Dhali uni su/ mmonṯal ’de/ mo tani ta kuŋ ḵar/e mo ibwambor ma Arumgimis mo mmomii gwoŋḵan jin ’kwarkunu ’baar mo dhali a’di jin ona gwoŋḵan gi Tap̱a mo ki dar gi miiwaḵ mo be.
Hili uni dar ga ’ci mo haali/ Ilisabaaṯ a’di ta’da burum mo dhali uni su/ cakin ki yil mo be.
Dhali ki a’di di’d mo mmomiiya ṯu’c ma gasiis ibwambor ma Arumgimis mo ka waḵ piti ’kon aṯu’c mo tani
isi me’d mii ma gasiis mo tani to biṯki’da p̱o/ a’di mo, to jin biṯu mo jin mina a’di cic̱ e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel gi Tap̱a mo dhali duḵa ’bicajwahar mo be.
Dhali awaambuhany ’kwani ’baar mo ’kokina pije/ mo mmo’tho mo ka tente/ jin duḵuwa ’bicajwahar mo be.
Dhali aman’doyu gwo gi Tap̱a piki a’di i is mo mmodosh ki ’bana bim poros ma gwaṯa/ jin duḵuwa ’bicajwahar mo.
Dhala Sakariyya mur ma du mo mmop̱arkina a’di a’di e mo dhali moŋḵo/ is biṯki’da po/ a’di mo be.

Hili aman’doyu gwo ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Dhalki is ki ḵo/ mo ma, Sakariyya, haala ’thom pini ciḵkunu mo be dhali ashim pini ka Ilisabaaṯ midi dho’th /e ya/in mo dhali gway piti mina /e iyuḵ ka Yohaan mo be.
Dhali /e mina bwa ’kuny mo dhali ’bor bwa mo be, dhali ’kwani ka ris mina bwa ’kuny mo gom mondho’th piti mo be.

Haali/ a’di midi eḵa/ eḵ mo mbwambori Tap̱a mo, dhali a’di midi diki p̱i yimana mura’th jin ḵa/u ki ŋah ŋah mo walla tomp̱inum ’bi’thga/ mo, dhali a’di minu ’tu’d mo ki Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo. me’d jin dikina a’di ’peni bwaŋ kum mo be.
Dhali a’di midi ṯu’k iya/ ma Israyiil ka ris mo e Tap̱a Arumgimis buni mo be,

dhali a’di midi ya mbwambori a’di ki shi/in mo dhali gi mom’bi’th ma Iliyya mo, mmoṯuka du gi icom ki uc̱i mo, dhali uni gun ushi gwo ha e mo e moyuḵ gi uni gun miin ka ḵar/e mo, mmothoson ’kwani is mo gom Tap̱a mo, ’kwani kun thosonkunu mo be.
Dhala Sakariyya thoḵki’da man’doyu gwo gwo mo ki: Yan miga/ mish kata mo? Haali/ aha/ si’da/ tana wathin dhan mo dhali ashim pem si’da/ a’di ca’d ki yil mo be.
Dhali aman’doyu gwo ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Aha/ tana Jibra/iil, a’di jin doshki’d e buŋ’kus ma Arumgimis mo, dhali aha/ hashkunu mo mmoc̱i /e gwo mo dhali mmoḵal /e gwom ’boro’d yansan mo.
Dhali hili mo mo ma, /e mini ta a’diye/ mo dhali mol gwo o mo ntaga tee ki to gwansan minu p̱u’d mo haali e diki gam gwom pem is mo, a’di jin minu thim ki mom buni mo be.
Dhali ’kwani ’kokin mo mmoc̱ora Sakariyya mo dhali uni merkin mo mmotayina a’di adiiṯe/ mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo be.

Dhali ki a’di yayi’d ka pije/ mo tani a’di diki mish ’twa/ walki uni mo dhali uni nyiṯẖkin ki a’di p̱arki tonyjan e mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo, dhali a’di ki mii jamas mii mmoṯor uni mo dhali a’di di’d ka ’diye/ mo naskina/.
Dhali ki mo ma cim piti jin miikina a’diya ṯu’c ’baarki’d mo tani a’di doḵki bway pam piti mo be.
Dhali ’ko’da tee gwansan mo tani ashim piti ka Ilisabaaṯ bwaaki’d mo dhali ka ppe ’kona ’kup̱i mudhe’d mo tani ayim bagki is piti mo mmo/o gwo mo ki:
Tap̱a a’di mii’d kan e aha/ mo ka tee jin hila a’di ap̱o/ aha/ mo mmoḵal mowaḵ pem jin waḵu aha/ e bwaman ’kwani mo.
Dhali ka ppe ’kona ’kup̱i pe’de/ mo tani aman’doyu gwo jin ta’da Jibra/iil mo a’di hashkunu mo ’peni Arumgimis mo e ’peŋkuman bampa/ gi Pany Jaliil mo jin yuḵu gway ka Naasira mo be,
eny nyaraŋ gana/ jin karkunu mo gom wathi/ jin yuḵu gway ka Yuusup̱ mo ’peni gu’b ma Dawuu’d mo, dhali nyaraŋ gana/ yan yuḵu gway ka Mariyam mo be.
Dhali a’di p̱u’dki’da yim mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Hayy, ayy, /en ’de/ jin gamkina ’the mo. Tap̱a a’di di’d e /e mo be.
Hili a’di yim mur ma du kagahara mo, gom gwo yan jin okunu mo, dhali kulum a’di e bwam piti mo gom monthe me’d yan midi ta atinta mo.
Dhali aman’doyu gwo ki o a’di yim gwo mo ki: Dhalku/ is ki ḵo/ mo ma, Mariyam, haali e gamkina ’the ’peni Arumgimis mo be.
Dhali hili mo mo ma. /e mini bwaa e bwam pini mo dhali dho’th ya/in mo dhali /e mini yer a’di gway ka Yesus mo be.
Dhali a’di midi eḵ mo dhali minu yuḵ ki Ya/ gi a’di jin Cayaa/ e ki Ca mo. Dhali Tap̱a Arumgimis midi c̱i a’di aḵursi ma ababam piti ka Dawuu’d mo be.
Dhali a’di midi ta tap̱a apo/ gu’b ma Yakuub ki sule/ mo, dhali bampam piti midi di kan ki dar gi ’pemen mo be.
Dhali aMariyam thoḵki’da aman’doyu gwo gwo mo ki: Yan minu mish mii kata mo ki aha/ mola wathiŋ gwaṯẖ kan mo?

Dhali aman’doyu gwo thoḵki’da yim gwo mo ki: Shi/in Dheleladhelel midi yayu/ apo e mo, dhali mom’bi’th gi a’di jin Cayaa/ e ki Ca mo midi ’kam /e ka la mo be. Wakan a’ci jin minu dho’th mo tani a’di minu yuḵ ki jiŋ ḵogu mo, a’di jin ta Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
Dhali hili mo mo ma, abas pini ka Ilisabaaṯ si’da/ bwaaki’da ’ci ki yil jin can ma yim mo, dhali yansan ta’da ppe ’kup̱i pe’de/ mo ka yim jin yuḵu gway ka yima burum mo be.
Haali/ ka Arumgimis mo tani to p̱iyi’d jin molu mii mo be.
Dhala Mariyam o gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma. Aha/ tana c̱iŋkina/ nyara/ gi Tap̱a mo. Dhalki a’di miinu mo gom aha/ mo isi ki gwom pini mo. Dhali aman’doyu gwo yaki’d mo ’pena yim mo be.
Dhali ka tee gwansan mo tani aMariyam cuki mis mo dhali ya mo ki jahanne/ mo e bampa/ gi paŋ ’kuwosh mo e ’peŋkuman bampa/ gi Pa Yahuudiyya mo.
Dhali ayim cic̱ki gu’b ma Sakariyya mo dhali theka Ilisabaaṯ me’d mo be.
Dhali ka Ilisabaaṯ ciḵki monthe me’d ma Mariyam mo tani a’ci p̱eki’d mo e bwa ma yim mo be. Dhali Ilisabaaṯ ’tu’dkunu mo ki Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo be,
dhali ayim ’terki cuuwa/ mo ka dhan ’twa/ jin caaca mo ki: Mom’bor mii gom /e e bwaman up mo dhali mom’bor mii gom maman gi bwam pini mo!
Dhali a’di yan c̱ikunu aha/ mo gomata mo? ka ta’da gi Tap̱am pem midi ’taki yayu/ i aha/ mo?
Haali/ hili mo mo ma. Ki ’twa/ jin thekina /e aha/ me’d mo p̱u’dki’d e bwany’cem pem mo tani a’ci p̱eki’d mo e bwam pem mo gom moŋ’kuny bwa mo be.
Dhali mom’bor mii goma yim, a’di jin gamki gwo is mo ki a’di minu thim mo, a’di jin okunuwa yim mo ’peni Tap̱a mo.
Dhala Mariyam o gwo mo ki: Aḵashiram pem eḵki Tap̱a mo,
dhali shi/in pem ’kunykina bwa mo eya Arumgimis jin ta’da Amanwoṯẖ pem mo,
haali/ a’di ki hil monyc̱a’b piti jin hatha nyarany c̱iŋkinam piti ’ko’d mo. Haali/ hili mo mo ma. ’Peni shwane/ mo tani aris ’kwani ma nyaḵum yil mo mini yuḵ aha/ gway ki a’di jin ’boru mii mo be.
Haali/ a’di jin ta gi mom’bi’th mo tani miiki’da dhan to jin eḵki’d e aha/ mo, dhali gway piti ḵogu mo be.
Dhali momiimiim piti di’d ap̱o/ uni gwansan kun ḵo/ a’di mo, ’peni uni gun tana nyaḵum yil ka nyaḵum yil mo be.
A’di ṯor ’bi’th piti ka bim piti mo be. A’di ḵwa/ki uni gun dhu is ki ca mo e gwalal buni kun kuluma uni eya dum buni mo be.
A’di ki thul uni gun ta gi ’bi’th ka ’cesh mo ’pena ḵursin tap̱am buni mo. Dhali a’di ki dhu uni gwansan ki ca mo kun hatha ’ko ’ko’d mo be.
A’di ki ’tu’d uni gun ’kosha ṯe/ mo ki tom ’boron mo, dhali uni kun ta pa ki pa mo tani dhukina a’di ’pen bwa ’te/ mo be.
A’di woṯẖki c̱iŋkinam piti ka Israyiil mo, mmoka momiimiim piti e mo be,
me’d gwo jin okina a’di ibabam bana mo be, eya Ibrahiim dhali iya/m piti ki sule/ mo.
Dhala Mariyam c̱a’bki’d mo nyaḵki a’di me’da ppe ’kup̱i kwara mo dhali doḵ pam piti ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo be.
Dhali mo p̱u’dki’d mo goma Ilisabaaṯ mmodho’th mo be dhali a’di ki dhodha ’ci jin ta ya/ mo.
Dhali imannyaḵ ’kom piti dhala bas piti ciḵki gwo ki Tap̱a ṯorki dhan miim piti e a’di yim mo dhali uni ’kunykina bwa mo nyaḵka yim mo be.
Dhali ka cim ’koni pekwara mo tani uni p̱u’dkin mo mmo’ciṯẖa/ ’ciya munyjal yis mo, dhali uni mini ’taki yer a’di gway ka Sakariyya ’ko’di gway gi com mo,
hili kum piti o gwo mo ki: Yisa wakana. A’di minu yuḵ gway ka Yohaan mo be.
Dhali uni o a’di yim gwo mo ki: Abas piniŋ kamu/ yisa yuḵu ki gway gi wakan mo be.
Dhali uni c̱i a’di jamas mii mo gom com mo mmo/o ki a’di minu yuḵ kata mo?
Dhali a’di doṯki uni cwam ba’d is mo jin gwaju ka ’diŋkilan dham mo mmo’kwar to mo dhali a’di ’kwarki’d ki: Gway piti ka Yohaan mo be. Dhali uni ’baar mo merkin mo be.
Dhali ki jahanne/ ’twam piti ḵa’dki’d mo dhala le’d piti ’cuḵki’d mo dhali a’di oki gwo mo mmo’bora Arumgimis bwa i is mo be.
Dhali moŋḵo/ is p̱u’dki’d ap̱owa ris imannyaḵ ’kom buni mo. Dhali aris to gwansan ’kokunu mo mmo/o ki lala’th mo e bampa/ ’baar mo gi paŋ ’kuwosh gi Pa Yahuudiyya mo be.
Dhali aris uni kun ciḵki uni mo tani dhuki uni eya dum buni mo dhali o gwo mo ki: A’ci yan midi ta ata mo? Haali/ me’d gi Tap̱a di’d e a’di mo be.
Dhali ababam piti ka Sakariyya ’tu’dkunu mo ki Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo dhali o gwo is mo mmo/o ki:
Mom’bor mii e Tap̱a Arumgimis gi ’Kwani ma Israyiil mo, haali/ a’di yayi’d mo mmobuṯ mo dhali mmowan ’kwanim piti ’ba/ mo be.
Dhali a’di ki ’de’k ce gi mowoṯẖ gom ana mo, e gu’b gi c̱iŋkinam piti ka Dawuu’d mo.
Me’d gwo jin okina a’di ki ’twa/ gi imanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo kun ḵogu mo ’peni kadhamo/ mo,
ki ana minu woṯẖ mo ’peni ’kup̱ bana mo, dhali ’peni me’d ga ris uni gun shi/i ana i e mo,
mmo’baar momiimiim piti gun onu is mo gom ibabam bana mo, dhali mmoka gwom piti e jin gamu me’d jin ḵogu mo.
Gwo yan jin ona a’di is jin thula a’di ababam bana ka Ibrahiim me’da p̱o/ mo,
mmoc̱i ana mony’cuḵ mo ’peni me’d gi uni gun ta ’kup̱ ki ana mo, ki ana mina mii a’di to mo ki dar gi moŋḵo/ is mo be,
e mo gi ḵo/uwa ḵo/ mo dhali e mo ma ḵar/e mo ibwambori a’di mo ka cimi ’baar mo gi moŋ’koki/em bana mo.
Dhali /e jin tana ’ci mo, /e minu yuḵ ka manc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis jin Cayaa/ e ki Ca mo, haali e mini ya ibwambori Tap̱a mo dhali thoson a’di bway mo be,
mmoc̱i mo jin mishu mowoṯẖ bana mo e ’kwanim piti mo, dhali e modhal miinthus buni ’pen mo be.
Ka du gi momiimii ma Arumgimis bana mo, ka tee mini kush mo mo ap̱o/ ana ’peni momis mo,
mmoc̱i moŋkush e uni gwansan gun ’kokin mo e mondhurumi’d mo dhali eya la gi mowu mo, mmoshu sho’k bana bway mo e bway gi moŋḵu’th is mo be.
Dhali a’ci ca’d mo dhali a’di ’bitha is mo e shi/in mo dhali a’di diki’d e mombwaasho mo ntaga tee jin ṯoru a’di eya tente/ e ’Kwani ma Israyiil mo be.
Dhali ka cim gwansan tani gwoŋḵan hashu mo ’pena Ughusthus Kaysar ki aris ’kwaniny’ceshi ’baar mo minu mii ’kwar gway buni mo.
A’di ta mo gi ’kwaru gway jin ṯwa/a/ jin miikunu ka Kiriniyuus ta’da mudhiir gi Pan Suriyya mo be.
Dhali uni ’baar mo iiki bway pu buniŋ gana/ mo ki she/ ki she/ mo mmo’kwar gway buni mo be.

Dhala Yuusup̱ yaki’d mo si’da/ ’peni Pany Jaliil mo. A’di yaki’d mo ’peni Pa Naasira em Bampa/ Yahuudiyya mo em Pan Dawuu’d jin yuḵu ka Beeṯlaham si’da/ haali/ a’di ta ’kwani gi gu’b ma Dawuu’d mo dhali awaḵ ma Dawuu’d mo be.
A’di yaki’d mo mmo’kwar gway ki is piti mo uni ka Mariyam jin ta a’di jin onu a’di ki bu’th mo, dhali a’di si’da/ cana bwa mo be.
Dhali ki uni ’kokin mo imun mo tani acim p̱u’dki’d mo jin mina a’di dho’th mo.
Dhali ayim dho’thki’da bwa nyaram piti jin ta ya/ mo. Dhali a’di ki ’tam a’di is ki burrinye/ dhali ’thi a’di eya kaḵ bip̱ mo haali/ mo p̱iyi’d gom uni e gu’b yilkina/ mo be.
Dhali e bampa/ yansan ki mon’thiny mo tani imanhil ḵa’bal ’kona pije/ mmohil ḵa’bal buni mo be.
Dhala man’doyu gwo gi Tap̱a piki uni i is mo dhali monyca gi Tap̱a ’twaḵi mo mo e isi uni mo dhali uni ḵo/kina ḵo/ is kagahara mo be.
Dhala man’doyu gwo ki o uni gwo mo ki: Dhalku/ is ki ḵo/ mo ma, haali/ aha/ guyina um gwom ’boro’d dhali gwo mmo’bor um bwa kagahara mo jin midi di goma ris ’kwani ’baar mo.
Haali/ ka tee yansan mo tani Amanwoṯẖ jin ta Tap̱a Ḵrisṯẖos a’di dho’thkunu mo gom um e Pan Dawuu’d mo be.
Dhali ki jamas mii yan mo tani a’di mina umi nyiṯẖ a’di mo be. Um mini gama ŋa/ ’tamkunu is ki burrinye/ mo dhali mmo/isha kaḵ bip̱ mo be.
Dhali ise/ iman’doyu gwon tiya ka ris ris ’peni momis nyaḵki ’ko ka man’doyu gwo mo be. Uni maŋana Arumgimis mo dhali o gwo mo ki:
Monyca ma Arumgimis isi momis mo, dhali moŋḵu’th is e mony’cesh e bwaŋ ’kwani gun ’bora a’di bwa i is mo.

Dhali ki iman’doyu gwo doḵkin mo ’peni uni imomis ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo tani imanhil ḵa’bal o gwo ka rem ’kup̱ ki: Dhalki ana iina mo shwane/ e Pam Beeṯlaham dhali p̱ar to yan e jin yayi’d jin ṯora Tap̱a ana mo.
Dhali uni iikin mo ise/ tani gamkina Mariyam dhala Yuusup̱ dhali ara ŋa/ mmo/isha kaḵ bip̱ mo be.
Dhali ki uni p̱arki a’di e mo tani uni ṯori gwo jin ciḵkina uni mo goma ’ci yan mo be.
Dhala ris ’kwani gun ciḵki a’di mo tani meren ki gwo gwansan gun ona imanhil ḵa’bal uni mo be.
Hila Mariyam a’di di’d mo mmodhu gwo gwansan mo mmokulum uni eya dum piti mo be.
Dhali imanhil ḵa’bal doḵkin ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo mmokara Arumgimis ki ca mo, dhali maŋki a’di mo goma ris to gun ciḵkina uni mo dhali kun mishkina uni mo me’d ji gi onu uni mo be.

Dhali ki mo thimi’d mo ka cim pekwara mo tani ki a’di ’ciṯẖkunuwa munyjal yis piti mo tani a’di yerkunu gway ka Yesus mo, gway jin c̱ikin ma man’doyu gwo mo nṯwa/a/ ki a’di ’kokunu mo mmobwaa mo e bwa mo be.
Dhali ki mo p̱u’dki’d mo gom mondhelel is buni mo isi ki gwoŋḵan ma Musa jin c̱inu mo tani uni suski a’di mo e Pa Urushaliim mo mmoc̱i a’di ki Tap̱a mo
(me’d gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo e gwoŋḵan gi Tap̱a jin c̱inu mo ki: Aris uniŋ gwaṯẖ ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ kun ḵa’dki bwan dho’th mo tani uni minu yuḵ gway ki uni kun dhelelin mo gom Tap̱a mo. )
Dhali uni suski a’di mo si’da/ mmomii to mmo’ciṯẖa/ basa ’cesh mo isi me’d gwo jin okina gwoŋḵan gi Tap̱a jin c̱inu mo ki bimbir gurko/ su/ walla gurko/ kun bap̱ani su/ mo be.

Dhali wathi/ diki’d mo e Pa Urushaliim jin yuḵu gway ka Simaan dhali wathi/ yan ta a’diŋ ḵar/e mo dhali ta a’diŋ gayiin mo a’di jin c̱orki momalas gi ’Kwani ma Israyiil mo dhali Shi/in Dheleladhelel diki’da po/ a’di mo be.
Dhali a’di ṯorkunu a’di eya tente/ mo ki Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo ki a’di midi ’taki diki wu mo nṯwa/a/ ki a’di diki p̱ar Tap̱a jin ta’da Ḵrisṯẖos e mo be.

Dhali a’di shi/inkunu mo ki Shi/in mo tani a’di p̱u’dki’d mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo. Dhali ki com dhali kum suskina ’ci jin ta’da Yesus mo tani mmomii a’di me’d isi mii gi gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo tani
a’di bu’th a’di mo ’ko’da bim piti mo dhali ’bora Arumgimis bwa i is mo dhali o gwo mo ki:
Tap̱a, dhalki c̱iŋkinam pini ya’d mo ki moŋḵu’th is mo ma, isi ki gwom pini mo,
haali/ em pem p̱arki bway gi mowoṯẖ pini e mo
a’di jin thosonkina /e mo e buŋ’kus gi ’kwani ’baar mo,
moŋkush yan mmo’cee eya tente/ gom ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo dhali gom monyca gom ’Kwanim pini ma Israyiil mo.
Dhali com dhali kum uni merkin mo gom gwo yan jin okina a’di gom a’di mo.

Dhala Simaan ’bor uni mii mo dhali owa Mariyam jin ta kum gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma, a’ci yan karkunu mo gom ku gi ṯa’kkin mo dhali mmocu ’Kwani ma Israyiil ka ris mo, dhali gom jamas mii c̱aan jin okunu gwo mo ap̱o/ a’di mo tani
(dhali gandala turga/ midi suka ḵashiram pini mo si’da/) ki gwo kun kulumu ka ris eya du mo minu ṯor eya tente/ mo.

Dhali ayima ’bomiŋ kamu/ diki’d mo jin ta’da Hanna mo. A’di ta ’bwa/ ma P̱anu/iil mo ’pena waḵ ma Ashiir mo. Ayim a’di caki’d ki yil kagahara mo dhali a’di c̱a’bki’d mo nyaḵka kaṯẖim piti mo ki yil pesu/ mo ’peni yil jin dina a’di ki nyaraŋ gana/ mo

dhala yim wun ma kaṯẖim piti mo dhali a’di di’d kan ntagi yil issi doŋon i’ce’dka doŋon apo/ mo be. Dhala yim diki ya mo ’peni gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo mmoluŋa luŋ mo ki moŋga/ to mo dhali mmo’tho mo ki mon’thiny mo dhali ki montee ilu/ mo be.
Dhali ki mo warki’d mo ka tente/ yan mo tani ayim pu’dki’d mo dhali ’bora Arumgimis bwa i is mo dhali mmo/o gwo mo gom a’di gom uni ’baar mo kun ’kokin mo mmohil gom mowan ’ba/ gi Pa Urushaliim mo.
Dhali ki uni ’baarkina ris to mii mo me’d isi ki gwoŋḵan gi Tap̱a jin c̱inu mo tani uni doḵkin ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo e Pany Jaliil mo e ’peŋkuman bampam buniŋ gana/ mo e Pa Naasira mo.
Dhali a’ci ca’d mo dhali ’bidhu is mo dhali ’tu’du mo ki moyuḵ mo. Dhala ’the ma Arumgimis c̱a’bki’da p̱o/ a’di mo be.
Dhali com dhali kum uni iikin isa yempa/ e Pa Urushaliim mo ki yil mo gom Mompe’kup̱anyolos mo be.
Dhali ki a’di ’kona yili ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo tani uni iikin mo me’d isi mii jin miinu mo be.
Dhali ki Mompe’kup̱anyolos ’baarki’d mo tani me’d jin doḵkina uni bway pa mo tani aYesus jin ta’da ’ci a’di c̱a’bki’d mo ŋ’ko’di uni mo e Pa Urushaliim mo. Com dhali kum ’koki mish a’di mo,
hili uni ṯoshkin ki a’di midi di i bwaŋ ’kwani mo tani uni iikin ka tee iiyan mo dhali uni ŋap̱ki a’di mo e bwaŋ ’kwani ma bas buni mo dhali ’kwani kun misha uni mo.
Dhali ki uni ’koki gam a’di mo tani uni doḵkin ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo e Pa Urushaliim mo dhali ŋap̱ a’di mo.
’Ko’da cim kwara mo tani uni gamki a’di mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo mmoc̱a’b mo e bwam imanṯor gwo mo mmociḵ gwo ’peni uni mo dhali mmodoṯ uni gwondoṯ mo.
Dhali aris uni kun ciḵ a’di mo tani uni merkin mo gom a’di mo mmomisha a’di gwo ’ban mo dhali gwonthoḵ piti mo be.

Dhali ki uni p̱arki a’di e mo tani uni merkin mo dhali ata’dam piti ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Ya/um, atinta miina /e aman wakan mo? Hili mo mo ma. Babam pini dhali aha/, aman ŋap̱kina /e ki mo/anan is mo be.
Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Atinta ŋap̱kina um aha/ mo? A/’kona um ki mish mo mowa ki aha/ mina mii di e gu’b ma Babam pem mo?
Dhali uni mol gwom piti ’ban jin ona a’di uni mo be.
Dhali a’di ya’d ka luŋgu’b nyaḵki uni mo dhali p̱u’d mo e Pa Naasira mo dhali a’di haki gwom buni e mo, dhali ata’dam piti a’di kulumki’da ris to gwansan eya dum piti mo be.
Dhala Yesus maru moyuḵ is mo dhali a’di ’tuntilkina buŋgwar is mo dhali ki yil mo, dhali ka ’the ma Arumgimis mo dhali ki jiŋ ’kwani mo be.

Dhali ki yil ta’da ḵarpa’c mo tani jin takin ma Thibariyuus Kaysar amaliḵ mo tani Punthi Bilaaṯus ta’da mudhiir gi Pa Yahuudiyya mo dhala Hirodus ta’da ra/iis rub gi Pany Jaliil mo dhala akam piti ka P̱ilibbus jin ta’da ra/iis rub gi Pa Ithuriyya mo dhala aTaraḵuniiṯis mo dhali Lisaniyuus ta’da ra/iis rub gi Pa Abiliyya mo be.
Dhali ki mo jin tan ma Hannaan dhala Kayaap̱a igasiis kun can mo tani Gwo ma Arumgimis p̱u’dki’d mo eya Yohaan mo a’di jin ta ya/ ma Sakariyya em bwaasho mo be.
Dhali a’di ya’d mo e mo ’baar mo ka kukul is mo e Pa Uurdun mo mmoc̱i gwo gom mo jin minu miiya mii ki yi’de/ mo dhali mmorica du is mo gom gwo gi miinthus jin minu gwam ’kwani mo.

Me’d gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo e bwaŋ gwo ma Ishaya jin ta’da manc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo ki: ’Twa/ gi jan ṯal ’de/ mmocuu gwo em bwaasho ki: Thosoni bway gi Tap̱a mo ma, kari bway piti ka ḵar/e mo.

Aris embul wosh mo ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mo tani minu ’tu’d mo dhali aris wosha turga/ ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mo dhali aris wosh minu dhu ki gwa’di ’baar mo, dhali bwaya kolga/ minu dhu ka ḵar/e mo, dhali bway kun ḵoḵoraḵoḵor mo tani mini ’tic̱ila/ ’tic̱il mo be,
dhali aris buŋgwar isi ’baar mo mini p̱ar bway mowoṯẖ ma Arumgimis e mo be.

Dhali a’di o gwo wakan si’da/ eya waambuhany ’kwani mo kun p̱u’dkin mo e mo jin minu miiya mii ki yi’de/ ki a’di mo ki: Um uc̱in tasha/ mo. Kaja rum um ki gwo mo mmoso mo ’pena nyor jin midi p̱u’du/ mo?

Dhodhi maman gana/ mo ma, kun mini ha me’d ki mo jin rijuwa du is mo dhali dhalku/ ki ṯel gwo ’pen mo mmo/o e is bum ki: Aman tana ga Ibrahiim jin ta’da babam bam mo, haali/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ka: Arumgimis mishi wosh gwansan war mo ki uc̱i goma Ibrahiim mo.

Me’d gi shwane/ athurmany a’di ’thikunu mo hila/ eya birman cwa mo, ka ris cwa ’baar mo ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ wakan kun ’koki dho’th mamana ’borga/ mo tani minu jep̱ ka ’cesh mo dhali minu ṯa’k mo e o’d mo be.
Dhala waambuhany ’kwani doṯki a’di gwo mo ki: Haali/ a’di wakan mo tani aman mina miiya tinta mo?

Dhali a’di thoḵki uni gwo mo ki: A’di jin ta gi burrinyen ’thami su/ mo tani dhalki a’di ḵwa/ a’di bwa mo ki a’di jin dara’d mo. Dhali a’di jin ta’d gi tonṯe/ mo tani dhalki a’di mii’d wakan si’da/ mo ma.
Dhali imantera thulp̱a/ si’da/ p̱u’dkin mo e mo jin miinuwa mii ki yi’de/ mo ki uni minu mii mo be dhali uni o a’di gwo mo ki: Manṯor gwo, aman mina miiya tinta mo?
Dhali a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Dhalku/ to ki ter mmo’ce’da p̱o/ mo doḵ/e, jasi a’di jin ṯorkunu um mo.

Dhali i/askar si’da/ doṯki a’di gwo mo si’da/ ki: Aman mina miiya tinta mo? Dhali a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Dhalku/ to ki dil ’peni jaŋ kamun ’de/ ki mombujur mo walla ki gwonthus jin ’ce’du ’te/ ap̱o/ mo dhali kap̱i mo ma ki to kun gama um ki ji miina um to mo.
Me’d jin ’kokina ’kwani mo mmoc̱ora c̱or mo dhali aris ’kwani doṯki gwo mo eya dum buni mo isi gwo goma Yohaan mo waḵki/ a’di wari ita’da Ḵrisṯẖos mo.

Yohaan thoḵki uni ’baar mo gwo mo ki: Aha/ miikina um ki yi’de/ mo tani hili a’di jin ca’d ki aha/ ki caŋ gana/ mo midi yayu/ mo be. Dhali wac̱kana p̱p̱am piti mo tani aha/ dinaki ha me’d mo mmo’cuḵ uni mo. A’di midi mii um ki Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo dhali ki o’d mo be.
Dhali ton ’dash toŋ ḵar shem piti di’d mme’d mo mmodhelel ja’dam piti mo dhali mmotul emen is mo e themes piti mo hila ’pi’b mina a’di c̱i’th ki o’d jin moli us mo be.
Wakan a’di malaski’da malas ka ris mo mmoc̱i gwom ’boro’d ki ’kwani mo be.
Hila Hirodus jin ta’da ra/iis rub mo tani a’di jin nyo/kina a’di ki gwo mo goma Hirodiyya, ash ma kam piti mo, dhali goma ris tonthus kun miikin ma Hirodus mo si’da/,
mmomarkina a’di uni isi ’baar mo tani a’di ki kara Yohaana sijin mo be.
Dhali ka ris ’kwani ’baar mo ’kokin mo mmomii ki yi’de/ mo tani dhala Yesus si’da/ ki a’di miikunu ki yi’de/ mo tani dhali di’d mmo’tho mo tani momis ḵa’dki’d mo be

dhali Shi/in Dheleladhelel thulki’di a’di mo mmobu’th jamas gi buŋgwar mo mmowa e ki gurko/ mo, dhali ’twa/ yayi’d ’peni momis mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: /e ta Ya/m pem jin enka/ mo. Ki /e mo tani aha/ ’bora bwa mo be.
Dhala Yesus ki a’di ṯelki mii ma ṯu’c piti ’pen mo tani a’di ’kona yili iss ’de/ i’ce’dka ’kume’d mo. Mmotana a’di ya/ ma Yuusup̱ mo (me’d jin ṯoshu kan mo) jin ta ya/ ma Hali mo
dhali jin ta ya/ ma Matṯẖaat mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Lawi mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Melki mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Yanna mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Yuusup̱ mo,
dhali jin ta ya/ ma Mattaaṯẖiya mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Aamuus mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Nahuum mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Hasli mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Najjaay mo,
dhali jin ta ya/ ma Ma/aaṯẖ mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Mattaaṯẖiya mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Shim/i mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Yuusup̱ mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Yahuusa mo,
dhali jin ta ya/ ma Yuhanna mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Risa mo, dhali jin ta ya/ ma Sarubbaabil mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Sha/alṯi/iil mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Niri mo,
dhali jin ta ya/ ma Melki mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Addi mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Gusam mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Elmudaam mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Iir mo,
dhali jin ta ya/ ma Yuusi mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Eli/aasar mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Yuriim mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Matṯẖaat mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Lawi mo,
dhali jin ta ya/ ma Shim/uun mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Yahuusa mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Yuusup̱ mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Yunaan mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Eliyagiim mo,
dhali jin ta ya/ ma Malaya mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Menaan mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Mattaṯẖa mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Naṯẖaan mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Dawuu’d mo,
dhali jin ta ya/ ma Yassa mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Ubiid mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Bu/as mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Salmuun mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Nahshuun mo,
dhali jin ta ya/ ma Aminadaab mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Araam mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Hasruun mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma P̱aaris mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Yahuusa mo,
dhali jin ta ya/ ma Yakuub mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Is/hak mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Ibrahiim mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Taarah mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Nahur mo,
dhali jin ta ya/ ma Saruuj mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Ra/u mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma P̱aalaj mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Aabir mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Shaalah mo,
dhali jin ta ya/ ma Giinaan mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Arp̱akshaad mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Saam mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Nuuh mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Laamak mo,
dhali jin ta ya/ ma Maṯushaalah mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Aḵnuuḵ mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Yaarid mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Mahlal/iil mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Giinaan mo,
dhali jin ta ya/ ma Anuush mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Shiṯ mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Aadam mo dhali jin ta ya/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
Dhala Yesus ’tu’dkunu mo ki Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo dhali doḵki’d ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo ’peni Yi’deŋ Ḵumma/ Uurdun mo dhali a’di ura Shi/in mo ka pije/ mo.
Dhali a’di diki’d em bwaasho ka cim ma issu/ mo dhali palkina tap̱a ma ruma ’cesh mo be. Dhali a’di diki shwa toŋ kamu/ mo eya cim gwansan mo. Dhali ka cim ’baarkin mo tani a’di ’koshkina ṯe/ mo be.
Dhali tap̱a ma ruma ’cesh ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Waḵki e ta Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo tani ḵani wosh yansan gwo mo ma, mmowar ki maa mo.
Dhala Yesus thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: A’di ’kwarkunu mo ki: Wathi/ midi diki c̱a’b mo ki e mo gom jasi tonṯe/ ’te/ mo.
Dhali tap̱a ma ruma ’cesh ki sus a’di ki mis mo dhali ṯor a’di aris ’peŋkuman bampa/ gi mony’cesh mo, ki e ’kamu’thki’d mo hila/ mo tani
dhali a’di ki o a’di gwo mo ki: E /e mo tani aha/ mina c̱i /e aris moshirr gwansani ’baar mo dhali monycam buni mo. Haali/ uni c̱ikunu aha/ mo dhali aha/ c̱ikina uni gwansan kun oyaa/ bwa mo be.
Waḵki e mini luŋ aha/ kan mo tani uni ’baar mo mini ta kum pini mo be.
Dhala Yesus thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: A’di ’kwarkunu mo be ki: /E mini luŋ Tap̱a Arumgimis pini mo, dhali a’di a’di ’de/ mo tani a’di imina /e mmii to mo be.

Dhali a’di ki sus a’di mo e Pa Urushaliim mo dhali a’di ki kar a’di e ’kup̱an gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Waḵki e ta Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo tani biṯi is pini ka ’cesh mo ma ’peni mahan mo,
haali/ a’di ’kwarkunu mo ki: A’di midi hash iman’doyu gwom piti mo mmoḵan gwo gom /e mo dhali mmoji /e mo,
dhali, E me’d buni mo tani uni mini ’de’k /e mo, isi ciki/ ki /e mina sho’k pini diki ṯorosh ap̱o/ wosh mo be.
Dhala Yesus thoḵki a’di gwo mo ki: A’di okunu mo ki: /e mini dhalku/ ki pal Tap̱a Arumgimis pini mo.
Dhali ki tap̱a ma ruma ’cesh ’baarki mompal piti mo tani a’di yaki’d mo ’peni a’di mo ntagi embula ’borga/ mo be.
Dhala Yesus doḵki’d mo ka nyaŋ’ko’d ki mom’bi’th gi Shi/in mo e Pany Jaliil mo dhali gwo gom a’di yaki’d ki lala’th mo eya ris bampa/ ’baar mo kun ’kon ki jiŋ ’kam mo be.
Dhali a’di ṯorki gwo mo e gu’b gi montul is buni mo dhali a’di karkin ma ris ’kwani ’baar ki ca mo.

Dhali a’di p̱u’dki’d mo e Pa Naasira mo e mo jin thip̱kunu a’di mo. Dhali a’di yaki’d mo e gu’b jin tulu is mo, me’d miim piti jin miikina a’di mo, ka cim ma pesu/ mo. Dhali a’di doshki’d ki mis mo dhali deŋ gwo e mo.
Dhali a’di c̱ikunu awarka/ gi gwo ma manc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ jin ta’da Ishaya mo. A’di ḵa’dki’da warka/ mo dhali gam mo jin ’kwarkunu gwo nycine/ mo ki:

Shi/in gi Tap̱a a’di diki’da p̱o/ aha/ mo, haali/ a’di ’koshki aha/ is ki monyca mo mmoc̱i gwom ’boro’d mo gom uni gun hatha’ko’d mo. A’di hashki aha/ mo mmobah eya tente/ mo mo jin ’cuḵu uni gwansan kun tana habuus mo, dhali mmoḵa’d uni e mo uni gun tana ja’da/ mo mmomish mo mo, dhali mmodhu uni gwansan ki ’kus mo, uni gun ’cwarkunu mo be,
mmobah eya tente/ yil jin kwanyu mo gom Tap̱a mo.

Dhali a’di mu’thki’da warka/ mo dhali c̱i a’di ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo e a’di jin doshki’d mo mmomii to mo dhali a’di c̱a’bki’da ’cesh mo. Dhali aris e gi ’kwani kun ’kon e gu’b gi montul is mo tani dhoro’thkina p̱o/ a’di mo be.
Dhali a’di ṯelki gwo ’pen mo dhali mmo/o uni gwo mo ki: Shwane/ Gwo ma Arumgimis yan jin ’kwarkunu mo tani a’di thimkunu mo e bwany’cem bum mo mmociḵ mo be.
Dhali aris ’kwani ’baar mo o gwo ki ’bore/ gom a’di mo dhali mer mo gom gwo ma ’the kun pikin mo ’peni ’twam piti mo. Dhali uni o gwo mo ki: A’di diki ta Ya/ ma Yuusup̱ mo ’taa?

Dhali a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ um mini thoḵ aha/ gwo mo ’peni gwoŋ gwar ka ’bi’th/e ki: /e jin tana hakiim mo tani wac̱i is pini mo ma. Gwo jin ciḵa aman mo gom miim pini jin miikina /e mo e Paŋ Kap̱ranahuum mo tani miiyi a’di si’da/ mmahan mo e bampam piniŋ gana/ mo ma.
Dhali a’di thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ona um gwo mo ki: amanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamoŋ kamu/ yisa mishu bu’th mo e bampam pitiŋ gana/ mo.

Dhali hili e gwoŋ gana/ mo tani aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki up̱ ka ris kun wuna ikaṯẖ ’kokin mo ka ris e ’Kwani ma Israyiil mo ka tee ma Iliyya mo, ki momis dar ga sho’k mo ki yili kwara mo dhali ka ppe ’kup̱i pe’de/ mo dhali adhan ṯe/ p̱u’dki’d mo ap̱o/ mony’ceshi ’baar mo.
Dhali Iliyya yisa hashkunu mo e jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ ’peni uni mo yisa, hili jasi e a’di jin di’d e Pan Sarp̱a mo e Bampa/ gi Pan Saydaa/ mo eya ’bom jin wun ma kaṯẖ mo be.

Dhali e mun mo tani ’kwani ’kon ka ris kun ’kosha monthus mo e ’Kwani ma Israyiil mo ka tee jin tan ma Aliisha amanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo dhali jan ’deŋ kamu/ ’peni uni yisa dhelelki’d mo yisa, hili jasa Nimaan gi Pan Suriyya mo be.
Dhali ki uni ciḵki gwo yansan mo tani aris ’kwani gi gu’b gi montul isi ’baar mo ’tu’dkunu mo ka nyor mo be.

Dhali uni cuki mis mo dhali kar a’di ’pen ka pije/ mo ’peni ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo dhali sus a’di mo eya liman ’twa/ wosh e mo jin nyaŋkunu ’peŋkuman pam buni mo, ki uni mini ’taki bel a’di ka ’cesh ka luŋgu’b mo be.
Hili mmoyakina a’di ki yampe mo e bwam uni mo tani a’di yaki’d mo.
Dhali a’di p̱u’dki’d ka luŋgu’b mo e Paŋ Kap̱ranahuum mo e ’peŋkuman pa gi Pany Jaliil mo. Dhali a’di c̱iki uni gwo mo ka cima pesu/ mo be.
Dhali uni merkin gom gwony c̱im piti jin c̱ina a’di ki moshirr mo be.
Dhali e gu’b montul isi mun mo tani wathi/ diki’d jin ta’d ga rum thus jin nyo/o’d mo. Dhali a’di cuu gwo ka dhan ’twa/ jin caaca ki:
Ahh. /e mini mii aman kata, Yesus gi Pa Naasira? /e p̱u’dkin mo mmo’ce’d am sho’k mo ’taa? Aha/ misha ki /e tana aja. /e ta jin ’de/ ma Arumgimis jin ḵogu mo.

Hila Yesus ḵucurki a’di ki gwo mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: C̱a’bi ki shwam mo, dhali piyi mo ma ’peni a’di mo. Dhali ka rum thus jin nyo/o’d biṯki a’di a’cesh mo e bwam uni mo tani a’di piki’d ka pije/ mo ’peni bwam a’di mo. A’di diki mii to shiyi’da kamu/ gom a’di mo.

Dhali aris uni ’baar mo merkin mo dhali doṯ gwo ka rem ’kup̱ mo ki: Gwo yan ta’da atinta mo? Haali/ ki moshirr mo dhali ki mom’bi’th mo tani a’di ḵanki’da rum thus kun nyo/on gwo mo dhali uni iikin ka pije/ mo be.
Dhali gwo gom a’di yaki’d ka pije/ eya ris mo ’baar mo e bampa/ kun ’kon ki jiŋ ’kam mo be.
Dhali a’di cuki mis mo dhali dhal gu’b gi montul is ’pen mo dhali cic̱ mo e gu’b ma Simaan mo. Dhali amar ma Simaan a’di ’ba’thki’d ki is jin ’batha’ba’th mo dhali uni ŋap̱ki a’di goma yim mo be.
Dhali a’di doshki’d e ’kup̱ ma yim mo dhali ḵucur ’ba’th ki gwo mo, dhali ’ba’th dhalki’da yim ’pen mo. Dhali ki jahanne/ ayim cuki mis mo dhali miiki uni to mo be.

Dhali ka tente/ yaki jis mo tani aris uni gwansan kun tan gi tiya kun ’bathan ki ’ba’th ki she/ ki she/ mo tani uni ḵalki uni mo e a’di mo dhali a’di karki me’d piti ap̱owa ris uni ’baar mo ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mo dhali wac̱ uni mo be.

Wakan si’da/ arum thus pikin ka pije/ mo ’peni bwam uni ka ris mo mmocuu gwo mo ki: /e ta Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo. Dhali hili a’di ḵucurki uni ki gwo mo dhali a’di diki dhal uni bway mo mmowal ’twa/ mo haali/ uni mishkin ki a’di ta’da Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
Dhali ki mo ta montee mo tani a’di yaki’d mo dhali ya mo e mo jin dar ki ’kwani mo. Dhali ’kwani ŋap̱ a’di mo dhali p̱u’d mo e a’di mo dhali uni ki non a’di mmoya mo ’peni uni mo be.
Hili a’di o uni gwo mo ki: Aha/ mina mii c̱i gwom ’boro’d gom Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo gom ’peŋkuman bampan tiya mo si’da/ haali/ aha/ hashkunu mo gom ’pemen yan mo be.
Dhali a’di c̱iki gwo mo e gu’b gi montul is gi ’Kwani Yahuudiyya mo be.
Ki ’kwani yap̱ a’di ki is mo mmociḵ gwo ma Arumgimis mo tani a’di doshki’d ki mis mo eya al yi’de/ gi Pa Jannisaaraṯ mo.
Dhali a’di p̱arki’da ḵur yi’de/ e isu/ mo eya al mo. Hili imancesh to yi’de/ uni iikin ka pije/ mo ’peni uni mo dhali uni ’kokin mo mmolama ’thim buni mo be.
